text2: Das Jahr 2020 ist da!  Berlin, 01.01.20: Das neue Jahr hat begonnen. In ganz Deutschland stellten Menschen die Jahrhunderte ein und begrüßten das Jahr 2020 um Mitternacht. Die größte Silvesterparty des Landes fand in Berlin traditionell wieder in Berlin im Brandenburger Tor statt der Party Mile Hunderttausenden und jubelte das riesige Feuerwerk, das den Nachthimmel über der Hauptstadt erleuchtete. Die Menge zur Partei war wieder so groß, dass die Ergänzungen bereits um 20:00 Uhr geschlossen wurden. Noch, bevor die Neujahrsnacht eine Debatte über die Bedeutung und den Unsinn von Böllerei im Hinblick auf den Klimaschutz sowie der Lärm und Aggression war. Zum ersten Mal wurden Raketen und Böller nicht nur in der deutschen Hauptstadt der deutschen Hauptstadt verboten, sondern auch in einigen anderen Bereichen - unter anderem im Alexanderplatz wurde ein Böllerbot gegeben. Die Berliner Polizei war mit einem großen Gebrauchsgebot, sprach jedoch vo  normalen Einsatz-Aufkommen für einen Silvesterabend in der Hauptstadt. Feuerwehr und Polizei mussten bundesweit zu einer Vielzahl von Einsätzen ausrücken. Schon tagsüber hatte es aus mehreren Regionen Deutschlands Berichte über Verletzte und Brände gegeben.

text1: Corona Opfer nicht umsonst gestorben  Präsident hebt Arbeitsmarktdaten HERVOR.TROtz den Anstieg der Corona-Infektionen in einer Reihe von US-Staaten sieht Minister Donald Trump das Land auf dem richtigen Weg aus. "Es war eine interessante Zeit, es war schrecklich, so dass viele Leben verloren gegangen sind, wir werden diese unglaublichen Leute nie vergessen. Aber sie sind nicht vergeblich gestorben", sagte Trump in einem am Freitagvideo veröffentlichten Bericht. stärker sein als je zuvor. Trump lobte sich auch in seiner Ansicht, hervorragende jüngste Daten vom Arbeitsmarkt. Die Corona-Pandemie hat die USA in fast der Hälfte der Staaten in einer besorgniserregenden Entwicklung in die USA genommen. In vielen Regionen erreichte die Zahl der täglichen neuen Infektionen in den letzten Peaks - einschließlich in den bevölkerungsreichen Bundesstaaten von Texas oder Florida.Ingesamt gibt es im Land mehr als 2,2 Millione . Der Gouverneur des Staates, Jim Justice, kritisierte das Verhalten am Montag scharf: "Unter meiner Aufsicht wird diese Art von Verhalten in keiner Regierungsbehörde des Staates toleriert." Darüber ist "Heil Byrd" - ein Hinweis auf den Trainer Kassie Byrd. Die B  hatte versucht, in eine Synagoge einzudringen. Als er scheiterte, erschoss er eine Passantin und einen Gast eines Döner-Imbisses. Er übertrug seine Tat über das Internet. (afp/les)

text1: Wtargnęli do domu 16-latka. Zastraszali i zabrali dwa telefony W sprawie zatrzymano dwóch dwudziestolatków. Tłumaczyli, że w ten sposób chcieli wymusić spłatę zaciągniętego wcześniej długu. Policjanci o zdarzeniu zostali poinformowani w ubiegłym tygodniu. Według relacji pokrzywdzonego dzień wcześniej do jego domu w Damasławku wdarło się dwóch dwudziestolatków. Zaatakowali go domagając się oddania kilkuset złotych, jakie wcześniej pożyczył. Pokrzywdzony szesnastolatek miał zostać zastraszony groźbami pobicia, jak nie spłaci wcześniejszej zaciągniętej pożyczki. Dodatkowo jeden z mężczyzn miał uderzyć w twarz zastraszonego chłopaka. Na koniec na poczet długu przywłaszczyli sobie dwa telefony komórkowe. Funkcjonariuszmadzony materiał dowodowy, na wniosek prokuratora zastosował wobec jednego z zatrzymanych areszt, drugi mężczyzna został poddany dozorowi policji - dodaje. Za popełnione przestępstwo grozi kara nawet do 5 lat więzienia. Autor:

text1: "Das Schrauben fehlt mir schon" Wegen der Coronakrise sind in Deutschland nicht nur die Schulen geschlossen, sondern auch viele Ausbildungsbetriebe. Etliche betroffene Arbeitgeber nutzen nun digitale Ausbildungswege. In der Theorie klappt das gut, in der Praxis hapert es manchmal. Ingolstadt/Berlin. Die Auszubildenden beim Automobilbauer Audi sollten keine Morgenmuffel sein. Schon um sieben Uhr geht der Ausbildungsbetrieb los, das gilt auch nach der Schließung der Audi-Bildungszentren wegen der Corona-Krise. "Um sieben Uhr steht der Trainer digital vor der Gruppe und bespricht mit den Azubis die anstehenden Aufgaben", sagt Christoph Hermreck, der bei Audi für die Koordination der Berufsausbildung verantwortlich ist. Für die rund 2400 Azubis bei Audi hat das Digital-Zeitalter nicht erst mit Corona angefangen. Schon seit einigen Jahren rüstet der Autobauer seinen Nachwuchs mit Tablets für dase massiv betroffen sind, nichts anderes übrig bleibt, als Ausbildungsverhältnisse zu beenden", sagt Wollseifer. Deswegen setzt sich der Verband dafür ein, dass auch Auszubildende bei den Regelungen zum Kurzarbeitergeld mitberücksichtigt werden
text2: Munich: Söder Explains Bavarian Corona Approach, Oktoberfest in Jeopardy A day after he was part of Chancellor Angela Merkel’s Corona conference with Germany’s federal states, First Minister Markus Söder introduced the path Bavaria intends to take. He wants to be more careful than others. The circumstances in Germany, including in Bavaria, were relatively good compared to other countries, Markus Söder said in Munich. “Fortunately, we did not have to go through the kind of situation others did”, the Bavarian First Minister stated. But Germany’s successes were “a delicate little flower”. In order to avoid relapses and a return to harsher measures, the country needed to learn how to live with Corona. Numbers Cause Optimism Söder explained that Bavaria had implemented intensive measures earlier than most other federal states. He said the numbers were partially encouraging, in January of 2019. text1: 鲁哈尼敦促美国停止“阴谋”，转而遵守核协议。政治事务部总统哈桑·鲁哈尼周三呼吁美国重返 2015 年的核协议，并放弃针对伊斯兰共和国的“阴谋”。鲁哈尼在西北部阿尔代比尔省举行的仪式上表示，一旦华盛顿开始履行国际协议规定的义务，德黑兰就准备好与美国进行会谈。 “每当他们（美国人）从他们开始阴谋的地方退后，我们也准备好了。他们需要回到他们践踏的承诺，承认他们对伊朗国家的错误，”他说。鲁哈尼指出，美国对伊朗施加最大压力的目的是“摧毁国家的威严，迫使该国投降”。 “这是不可能的。敌人应为错误遵守全面协议第二十六条和第三十六条而悔改。它的最新举措是在 11 月，当时工程师们开始将六氟化铀气体送入德黑兰以南的地下福尔多工厂的封存浓缩离心机中
text2:
Iran, China boosting strategic partnership as FM Zarif visits Beijing
BEIJING (Agencies): The top diplomats of Iran and China have emphasized the need for the two countries to strengthen their strategic relations and keep up consultations on issues of bilateral and international significance.

In a meeting with his Chinese counterpart, Wang Yi, in Beijing on Tuesday, Iran’s Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif said that establishing strategic ties shows the two sides’ keenness to reinforce their cooperation.

“We need to keep up regular bilateral consultations on a variety of issues and this trip serves that purpose,” he added.



Zarif further hailed China for supporting Iran’s stance on the international stage.

He also criticized unilateral US sanctions against Iran, calling on the world community to counter unilateralism and back multilateralism.

The Chinese foreign minister, for his part, underscored the necessity of strengthening ties with Iran.

In the current situation, he added, the two countries should exchange views on different issues in addition to maintaining contact.

Zarif arrived in Beijing earlier in the day following a visit to the Russian capital, Moscow.

Prior to Zarif’s arrival, Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson Geng Shuang said the Iran nuclear deal would be on the agenda of the talks between Zarif and Wang.

“China would like to work with Iran to ensure the steady development of the China-Iran comprehensive strategic partnership, safeguard the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), and uphold peace and stability of the [Persian] Gulf Region in the Middle East,” he said, referring to the nuclear accord by its official name.

Elsewhere in his remarks, Geng described China and Russia — two of the signatories to the JCPOA — as “comprehensive strategic partners of coordination,” adding that that they have been “in close communication and coordination on the Iranian nuclear issue and other major international and regional hotspot issues.”

The JCPOA was signed between Iran and six world states — namely the US, Germany, France, Britain, Russia and China — in 2015. It was also ratified in the form of a UN Security Council resolution.

However, Washington’s unilateral exit in May 2018 and subsequent re-imposition of sanctions against Tehran left the future of the historic agreement in limbo.

In compliance with Articles 26 and 36 of the JCPOA, the Islamic Republic has, since May 2019, gone through four stages in scaling back parts of its commitments in retaliation for the US’s pullout and Europe’s failure to protect Iran against the American sanctions.

Iran, Russia: US exit from JCPOA endangers region, world

At a joint press conference after their meeting in Moscow on Monday, Zarif and Lavrov said the United States’ withdrawal from the JCPOA constitutes a serious reversal in the consultation process on the Iran nuclear issue and poses a threat to the security of the Persian Gulf region and the entire world

text1: LeBron James, Lakers ring in 2020 after strong start to season EL SEGUNDO — To welcome in the next decade, the Lakers shed their purple and gold for a night, opting for black-tie suits instead. They were all over each other’s social media feeds, dancing and smoking cigars on Monday night as LeBron James celebrated his 35th birthday. Because the Lakers play the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday night, New Year’s Eve celebrations are expected to be significantly toned down. James said he only decided three days before the big night that he would have a party at all, which his wife Savannah helped assemble on the short turnaround. It wasn’t just a birthday, but a turning of the page on the year as well. “I was able to kill two birds with one stone, get my teammates there, coaching staff, my family, my friendsron: "We ended 2019 in a good position to continue to get better, and play better basketball in January than we did in December.” pic.twitter.com/CZnJC3MsC6 — Los Angeles Lakers (@Lakers) January 1, 202
text2: From the editor: Happy New Year It's natural at this time of the year to both reflect and to look ahead. For us here at the Packet we look back on a successful year, as more people than ever before are reading what we write. That growth has come on our digital platform, thepacket.co.uk At the close of 2019, more than five million pages had been read on our website – around two million more than in 2018. We continue to have a loyal audience in print too and we thank those who believe that our journalism is worth paying money for each week. In 2020 we as a news outlet and, indeed, an industry, continue to fight on various fronts. Aside from battling to secure the advertising revenue needed to survive, one that regularly rears its rather ugly head is the concept of 'fake news'. This is a term that gets thrown around all too frequently, usually to express dismay at a story that, you can be assured that it has been verified before being published. Thank you for your support and I wish you a happy New Year. The editor's regular column can be read every week in the Packet, on sale each Wednesday for 85p

text1: Macron dénonce ses accusateurs Il a de nouveau riposté. Fidèle à cette tactique qui lui vaut, à chaque fois, de raviver les braises de la colère, Emmanuel Macron a dénoncé devant les journalistes, jeudi, à son retour d’Israël, les «discours politiques extraordinairement coupables» de certains de ses opposants. Une charge dirigée largement contre la gauche radicale de Jean-Luc Mélenchon. «Aujourd’hui s’est installée dans notre société, et de manière séditieuse, l’idée que nous ne serions plus dans une démocratie, qu’une forme de dictature se serait installée», a-t-il lâché. Le leader de La France insoumise a aussitôt dénoncé cette nouvelle attaque. Lire aussi notre ancien éditorial (19.01.20): Macron et les icebergs français Plus contro. Mais il y a en démocratie un principe fondamental: le respect de l’autre, l’interdiction de la violence, la haine à combattre.» Difficile de croire, après cette salve, que les invectives politiques vont retomber
text2:
Coronavirus: le report des élections municipales à l’étude, en France
La France se prépare-t-elle à reporter les élections municipales ? Le premier tour doit avoir lieu dimanche. Il se pourrait que le président Macron, qui doit faire une allocution ce jeudi soir, annonce le report des élections de dimanche.

L'entourage d'Emmanuel Macron explique au JDD que « toutes les options sont ouvertes » et que « rien n'est décidé ». D'après le JDD toutefois, un report des élections municipales serait à l'étude. « Le processus de consultation des présidents des deux chambres, à propos d'un report du scrutin, a commencé. Jusqu'à ce matin encore, il n'était pourtant pas question de reporter le vote », indique le JDD.

text1: 13 puppies find new homes after inadequate care in northern B.C. VANCOUVER -- The new year will start off much better than 2019 did for 13 puppies who were living without adequate food and shelter months ago. Those 13 Saint Bernard/Great Pyrenees puppies have all found new homes after their previous owner – an aspiring breeder in northern B.C. – surrendered them to the SPCA. The older puppies had been living in a small, dirt pen while the younger ones had been confined to a horse trailer. "All the puppies inside the horse trailer had been living in feces that were five inches thick and had mild urine scalding on their paws," said SPCA North Peace branch manager Candace Buchamer in a news release. "Most of the pups had minor bite wounds on their faces and were frightened to gain confidence. "All 13 puppies found guardians who appreciate their unique personalities and are willing to work with them on their flaws," the SPCA said. "Each pup will enjoy many wonderful years ahead with their new families in loving homes.
text2: Jets investigating their unprecedented injury crisis The Jets injury problem was so bad in 2019 that the trainer’s room barely had enough space for all of the rehabbing players, who had to schedule their times with trainers to avoid a logjam. Now, the Jets are trying to figure out if there was a reason for all of those injuries or if it was just bad luck. Jets coach Adam Gase said they began looking at what was causing all the injuries about two months ago. “I wish it was cut and dry and say, ‘Hey we had 15 hamstrings,’ ” Gase said. “But we’re having season-ending-type injuries. We’ve had discussions with the training room, strength and conditioning; [general manager] Joe [Douglas] and I have had conversations; we’ve talked to other people. We’re going to continue to take deeper di priorities this offseason. Figuring out a solution to their injury issue, if there is one, should be near the top of the list. For more on the Jets, listen to the latest episode of the “Gang’s All Here” podcast

text1: Rassismus-Debatte lässt Uncle Ben’s verschwinden New York Die jüngste Rassismus-Debatte in den USA nach der Tötung von George Floyd hat auch bei bekannten Lebensmittelmarken Konsequenzen. Der Mars-Konzern hat angekündigt, dass er seine Reis-Marke Uncle-Ben’s ändern wird. Auch PepsiCo will seine Marke Aunt Jemima, auf dessen Logo eine Schwarze für Pancake-Mix und Syrup wirbt, einmotten. Andere Hersteller überdenken derzeit ebenfalls ihre Marken, weil sie alte Stereotypen von Schwarzen als Sklaven bedienen. Die Konzerne haben im Zuge der jüngsten Rassismus-Diskussion erkannt, dass ihre Marken nicht mehr zeitgemäß sind. Die Namen mit „Uncle“ und „Aunt“ gehen auf eine Zeit zurück, in der sich Weiße in den USA weigerten, Schwarze mit Mister oder Missum sicherzustellen, dass wir und unsere Marken nicht unabsichtlich zum systematischen Rassismus beitragen“. Mehr: Morgan Stanley muss sich gegen eine Klage ihrer ehemaligen Diversity-Managerin wehren. Aber auch andere Unternehmen müssen sich auf Klagen einstellen
text2: Rassismus-Debatte: Reismarke Uncle Ben’s will ihr Logo ändern 1 Seit 1946 ziert die Reispackungen von „Uncle Ben’s“ ein Logo mit einem älteren afroamerikanischen Herrn. Foto: AFP/JUSTIN SULLIVAN Der Mars-Konzern denkt darüber nach, das Logo der Reisemarke Uncle Ben’s zu ändern. Aber woher stammt dieses Logo eigentlich? Link kopiert Washington - Ein älterer schwarzer Mann mit weißen Haaren und einer Fliege um den Hals: Angesichts der anhaltenden Anti-Rassismus-Proteste in den USA will die bekannte Reismarke Uncle Ben’s ihr Logo ändern. Das Unternehmen wolle seinen Beitrag zu einem Ende von „rassistischen Vorurteile und Ungerechtigkeiten“ leisten, erklärte am Mittwoch der Lebensmittelriese Mars, zu dem Uncle Ben’s gehört. Deswegen sei Floyd durch den brutalen Einsatz eines weißen Polizisten in der Großstadt Minneapolis. Die Gewalttat hat in den USA zu einer intensiven Debatte über Rassismus, die Diskriminierung von Schwarzen und die Zeit der Sklaverei geführt

text1: The Lure of B.A.S.S. – Local High School Students Fish for Scholarships Advertisement The Genoa fishing team is inviting all high school anglers to join the Ark-La-Tex Bassmasters and Junior Fishing Trail. In addition to the general benefits of fishing, youths have a chance to win thousands in scholarships. The Ark-La-Tex Bassmasters and Junior Fishing Trail started because Jason Townsend saw a need. Father and organized-fishing enthusiast, Jason wanted to share his passion for sport with his son but found that difficult to do around here. “I started this because we don’t have any organized fishing in this area. We would have to travel three hours,” Jason said. About ten years ago, some of the parents in Genoa got together to organize a local high school fishing league. After helping out for I grew up in and graduated from, and do this with my own son – you really can’t get better than that.” Anyone interested in participating or sponsoring contact: Jason Townsend Email or Genoa Central Dragon High School Fishing Team on Facebook
text2: Carramar newsagent celebrates selling $1 million lotto ticket after tough 2019 Someone in WA will be absolutely loving 2020 after taking out division one on the first day of the year, and the agent who sold the winning ticket is buzzing too after a tough 2019. The winning ticket was sold in Carramar, in Perth’s north, ahead of Wednesday night’s draw, matching numbers 23, 24, 37, 25, 20 and 43. The ticket was worth a cool $1 million. NewsXpress Carramar owner Ray Pigdon said it was the best change of fortune coming off the back of a tough 2019. “2020 has been a perfect start,” he said. “Given we had a ram raid at our store last year, it’s nice to start this year with the first division one prize of 2020. “I’m hoping the ticket has been sold to one of our regulars who have stuck with us.” Play Video A WA Police spoke told Community News at the time “They’ve smashed through our roller shutters and all our stock at the front as well as glass shelving and cabinets.” She said thieves had taken a safe containing cash, scratchies and stamps

text1:
Dymisja Andrzeja Dudy sposobem na wybory?
Prawo i Sprawiedliwość rozważa dymisję prezydenta Andrzeja Dudy, co miałoby umożliwić rozpisanie wyborów prezydenckich w dowolnym terminie do połowy lipca. Taki scenariusz jest możliwy według źródeł, na które powołuje się Onet.

Jak informuje Onet, powołując się na trzy niezależne źródła, w obozie władzy rozważana jest dymisja prezydenta Andrzeja Dudy, która miałaby umożliwić rozpisanie wyborów w późniejszym terminie w zgodzie z obowiązującą konstytucją. Według rozmówców portalu, podanie się do dymisji przez głowę państwa to wariant ostateczny, ale w świetle problemów z głosowaniem korespondencyjnym i nieubłagalnie zbliżającego się terminu 10 maja, takie rozwiązanie jest obecnie poważnie brane pod uwagę. Partia rządząca analizowała już taki scenariusz z prawnikami.

Jak wyjaśnia Onet, jeśli prezydent Andrzej Duda dobrowolnie podałby się do dymisji, to głową państwa automatycznie zostanie marszałek Sejmu i to on zarządzi przeprowadzenie nowych wyborów „nie później niż w czternastym dniu po opróżnieniu urzędu, wyznaczając datę wyborów na dzień wolny od pracy przypadający w ciągu 60 dni od dnia zarządzenia wyborów”. Oznacza to, że wybory prezydenckie mogłyby się wówczas odbyć nawet w ciągu 2,5 miesiąca od ogłoszenia dymisji.

Przygotowany przez PiS projekt ustawy o głosowaniu korespondencyjnym w tegorocznych wyborach prezydenckich nadal znajduje się w Senacie, ale nawet jeśli na czas trafi ponownie do Sejmu, to jest duża szansa, że Sejm go odrzuci. Przyjęciu projektu przeszkodzą posłowie Porozumienia Jarosława Gowina, który sprzeciwia się przeprowadzeniu wyborów w formie korespondencyjnej 10 maja.

Jak zapewnia Onet, powołując się na swoje źródła, jeśli prezes PiS Jarosław Kaczyński nie będzie pewien, że projekt zostanie przyjęty przez sejmową większość, to w ogóle nie dopuści do poddania go pod głosowanie.

Sasin dementuje: Dymisja nie jest brana pod uwagę

Wicepremier i minister aktywów państwowych Jacek Sasin oświadczył na antenie Radia Zet, że dymisja prezydenta Dudy nie jest w PiS brana pod uwagę, a jedynym rozpatrywanym wariantem w kwestii wyborów prezydenckich jest forma korespondencyjna.

„(Dymisja prezydenta - red.) Nie jest brana pod uwagę. Dzisiaj jedynym scenariuszem, który bierzemy od uwagę, jest ustawa o głosowaniu korespondencyjnym i wybory w trybie korespondencyjnym na podstawie tej ustawy” - powiedział Jacek Sasin.

Do doniesień Onetu odniósł się także na Twitterze sam Andrzej Duda.

„Onet.pl podobno rozważa moją dymisję. W redakcji już głosowali i zdecydowali. Inne redakcje podchodzą do tego z pełną powagą. Klamka zapadła” - napisał prezydent na swoim koncie w Twitterze.
text2: President Duda: Resignation? It's the fake of the day It depends on who is the news of the day. For me, this is the fake of the day - with these words President Andrzej Duda referred to the rumor about his alleged resignation. Onet informed yesterday that Law and Justice is considering the resignation of President Andrzej Duda, which would make it possible to call presidential elections at any time by mid-July, Onet reported yesterday, citing three independent sources in the ruling camp. According to the portal's interlocutors, the resignation of the head of state is a final option, but in light of the problems with postal voting and the impending deadline of May 10, such a solution was to be taken into account. As Onet reported, the ruling party has already analyzed such a scenario legally - ed.) It is not taken into account. Today, the only scenario we take into account is the act on correspondence voting and elections by correspondence based on this act "- said Jacek Sasin

text1: Nach US-Taliban-Abkommen: Pentagon bestätigt Truppenabzug  Die USA haben sich versichert, dass die zuvor vereinbarte mit der Taliban-Bewegungsreduzierung der Streitkräfte bereits in vollem Gange ist. Die US-Truppen haben nach den Pentagons den Abzug der Islamischen Republik begonnen. Das Verteidigungsministerium hat unterstrichen, dass "die US-Streitkräfte in Afghanistan nach der gemeinsamen Erklärung der Vereinigten Staaten und der Islamischen Republik Afghanistan und der Friedensabkommen zwischen den Vereinigten Staaten und dem Friedensabkommen zwischen den Vereinigten Staaten und den Taliban begannen, seine Zahl innerhalb von 135 Tagen auf 8600 zu senken" . Dieser Truppenabzug basiert auf bestimmten Bedingungen, teilt das Pentagon mit. Infolge einer gemeinsamen Erklärung werden die USA ihre Operationen, um den Terrorismus gegen Al Qaida zu bekämpfen und weiterhin den islamischen Staat * fortzusetzen und die afghanischen Sicherheit ringern. US-Außenminister Mike Pompeo sagte am Donnerstag, die USA seien zuversichtlich, dass die Taliban-Führung alles Unternehmen werde, um den Deal einzuhalten. *Terrorvereinigung, in Russland und Deutschland verboten ac/mt
text2: U.S., Taliban reach truce, paving way for U.S. withdrawal MUNICH, Germany, Feb 15, 2020 (BSS/Xinhua) -The United States and the Taliban have agreed on a weeklong reduction of violence that could pave the way for a U.S. troop withdrawal from Afghanistan, a senior U.S. official said Friday, while cautioning that U.S. troop reductions will be conditioned on the Taliban’s meeting commitments. The deal was struck after protracted negotiations in the Qatari capital Doha and was announced after a meeting between U.S. Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, Defense Secretary Mark Esper and Afghan President Ashraf Ghani on the sidelines of the Munich Security Conference. The U.S. administration official said the violence reduction pact was very “specific” and covered the entire country, including Afghan government forces. The truceal. “Should the Talibs implement what they’ve committed to doing, we will move forward with the agreement,” the offical told reporters in Munich. The seven-day period has yet to begin, but will take effect soon, the offical said

text1: Harley Quinn acaba de convertirse en la mayor amenaza del multiverso ADVERTENCIA: Lo siguiente contiene spoilers de Dial H for Hero #10 de Sam Humphries, Joe Quinones, Jordan Gibson y Dave Sharpe. Durante bastante tiempo, los cómics se han divertido con los universos alternativos. Marvel y DC han tenido multiversos tanto grandes como pequeños, y abundan las historias de "qué pasaría si". Algunas de estas versiones alternativas de personajes clásicos incluso se convierten en íconos en sí mismos. Superman soviético de Superman: Red Son, Thomas Wayne Batman de Flashpoint y, potencialmente el más popular, Miles Morales del ahora desaparecido Ultimate Marvel Universe. Si bien muchas de esas alternativas son de corta duración, algunas de ellas aún logran capturar la imaginación. Este es definitivamente el caso del aterrador Harli-Quinnitor de Dial H para Hero #10. Continúa desplazando al villano esta vez. Dial H for Hero #10 llegará a las estanterías en enero de 2020. text1:
Szokujące! Wściekły papież Franciszek. Zawył z bólu i… uderzył kobietę! To nagranie obiegło cały świat [VIDEO]
Papież Franciszek stracił panowanie nad sobą? Podczas spotkania papieża Franciszka z setkami osób na Placu Świętego Piotra w sylwestrowy wieczór doszło do incydentu, zarejestrowanego przez media. Jedna z kobiet tak mocno go chwyciła, i szarpnęła, że Ojciec Święty zawył z bólu. Papież uderzył ją w dłoń, by się uwolnić.

Po nieszporach w bazylice watykańskiej Franciszek we wtorek wieczorem poszedł na plac przed bazyliką watykańską, by obejrzeć stojącą tam szopkę.

Witał się z setkami ludzi, którzy tam się zgromadzili się, by złożyć mu noworoczne życzenia. Błogosławił dzieci, pozdrawiał wszystkich po kolei, rozmawiał z wiernymi.

Media szybko obiegło krótkie nagranie z incydentu na placy św. Piotra. Jedna z kobiet chwyciła za rękę papieża i przyciągnęła go do siebie. Franciszek ewidentnie odczuł w tym momencie ogromny ból. Na jego twarzy pojawił się krzyczący, bolesny grymas.

Papież dwukrotnie uderzył kobietę po rękach, żeby się uwolnić z jej uścisku. Coś do niej rzucił na odchodne a jego wściekła mina mówiła wszystko.

Trzeba zaznaczyć, że papież jest po pierwsze człowiekiem starszym. Dla niego tak mocne pociągnięcie za rękę to problem. Po drugie od lat ma kłopoty z chodzeniem m.in. przez przebytą w przeszłości operację. Kiedy został pociągnięty jego ciało odruchowo próbowało zachować równowagę. To musiało wywołać u papieża duży ból, który go tak zirytował.

Kobieta z pewnością zrobiła źle szarpiąc tak mocno rękę starszego, schorowanego człowieka. Papież zareagował odruchowo, bez zastanowienia, bo ból wymusza na nas reakcje obronne. Ale może po chwili powinien się opamiętać i chociaż zmienić minę? Na pewno zawiodła ochrona Franciszka.

This evening after visiting the Nativity scene in St. Peter's Square, Pope Francis loses his cool after being grabbed by a pilgrim who wouldn't let go of his hand. The Pope repeated slapped her hand and told her to let go of him. pic.twitter.com/6Qrgh8aZKz — Catholic Sat (@CatholicSat) December 31, 2019

NOPE FROM THE POPE: While greeting people in St. Peter's Square on New Year's Eve, Pope Francis had to pull himself away from a woman who grabbed his hand and yanked him toward her.  pic.twitter.com/0XzxtWTMUd — CBS News (@CBSNews) December 31, 2019
text2: Pope Francis hit a woman in St. Peter - Free Poland - News A strange incident occurred yesterday during the meeting of Pope Francis with thousands of pilgrims who gathered in crowds in St. Peter's Square in the Vatican. After the service, the Holy Father went on foot to the faithful. One of the women gripped his hand tightly, arousing his rage. The Pope hit her to free herself. Everything took place after Vespers in St. Peter. The Pope went to the nativity scene staged in this place. Along the way, he greeted hundreds of believers, greeted them and blessed them. At one point, one of the pilgrimages snapped a sentence in her direction in anger and indignant, but quickly departed irritated. For: -franciszek-hit-woman-on-square-sw-piotra 01/01/202

text1: Incydent w Watykanie. Franciszek przeprosił, że stracił cierpliwość [WIDEO] Incydent, do którego wizyta papieża wystąpiła podczas wizyty Plaza, gdzie poszedł zobaczyć łóżeczka stojące tam, zarejestrowane kamery.Na nagraniu, szeroko rozpowszechnione media, można zobaczyć, jak jedna z kobiet chwyciła rękę papieża podczas powitania, kiedy wyjechał, szarpnęła go boleśniejej uścisk.Bieganie w środę w południe do wiernych zgromadzonych na placu Papież powiedział przed modlitwą Angelus: "Stracimy cierpliwość wielokrotnie, przepraszam za zły przykład wczoraj". ścisku. Zwracając się w środę w południe do wiernych zebranych na placu manewru talerz przed modlitwą Anioł Pański: "Wiele razy tramy cierpliwość, przepraszam za zły przykład wczoraj".

text1: Adıyaman'da eğlence amaçlı 5 bin maske ele geçirildi İl polis departmanı, kaçakçılık ve organize suç dalları şubesinin bilgisi olmuştur, şehir merkezindeki tek kullanımlık maskenin bilgisini unormity yöntemleri ile yapmıştır. Bakanlığın imalatında üretildiği 5 bin atılabilir maskeli oldu.Sağlık, Sağlık Bakanlığından İzinsiz, Maske, temel ve steril koşulların ihlal edilmesinde üretilir.  Şekil maskesi üretildiği tespit edilen 5 bin tek maske bulundu. Hakkında idari Sayılı eğitimli firma sahibine 4703 Ürünlere İlişkin Teknik Mevzuatın Hazırlanması ve uygulanabilmesi Dair Kanuna da uygulanabilir para cezası.
text2: Adıyaman kendini karantinaya aldı! Adıyaman İl İl Hifzissihha Hifzissha Kurulu tarafından alınan karar, Adıyaman'ın tüm bölgelerine yasaklandı.Karar, 13 Nisan'dan 13 Nisan tarihleri arasında 13 Nisan tarihleri arasında 13 Nisan 2020 saatten itibaren 24.00'dan 14 gün ile sınırlı kaldı.Adıyaman İl Polis Departmanı, İl Gandarma Komutanı'na bağlı ekipler doğrultusunda, Adıyaman'ın giriş ve çıkış noktalarında uygulamayı başlattı.Sosyal Koruma, Rehabilitasyon Merkezleri, Çocuk Evleri, Bakım Merkezleri ve Birinci Dereceye Yaklaşacaklar ve Teşhis Tedavisi ve Randevu ile Sağlık Birimlerine Katılanlar ve Hastalık Etmekte olanlarbilgi ve yetkililer.Belgelerle birlikte belgelerle olan insanlar, seyahat belgesi olanlarla seyahat etmelerine izin verilir.14 gün boyunca devam etmek için alınan karar.  Çocuklara ait olan ve yetişkinlere ait olan bir belgeye sahip olan seyahatine gidebileceğiniz bir seyahat. Belirtilen taşımayan ve seyahat belgesi gelmeden giriş ve çıkışlarına izin verilmiyor. Alınan kararın 14 gün boyunca devam edildiği belirtildi.

text1: Negociación por el IVA: La mayoría de los alimentos de la canasta básica subirá 7% desde el jueves  Negociación del IVA: la mayoría de los alimentos de la canasta básica aumentarán el 7% desde el jueves del Ministro de Producción acordados con los proveedores y super para que no transfieran el 21%. Son productos que estaban exentos del impuesto después del paso. El Ministro de Desarrollo Productivo de Matías Kulfas alcanzó un acuerdo con los supermercados por la exención del IVA. Los proveedores de las cadenas y tiendas aceptan para absorber un promedio del aumento del IVA, mientras que el otro 7% se transferirá al aumento de precios. El pan, la yerba, el yogur, el arroz, el azúcar, el asesinato cocinado, los huevos, la polenta, las conservas vegetales lo harán. Tener un aumento del 7%. En el caso de los aceit . La medida, que siempre es prometida en las campañas electorales, destaca el rechazo por parte de los gobernadores, ya que alimentan sus arcas con la coparticipación que genera este impuesto, cuya recaudación es nacional.
text2: El Gobierno suspendió el aumento de febrero en las naftas hasta de 2020 –Informate Acá  El gobierno oficializó este martes, el último día del año, la suspensión del aumento del combustible previsto para el 31 de diciembre. La medida se publicó en el boletín oficial y se había comunicado a las estaciones de servicio. El aumento era ser del 5% en los proveedores, pero el presidente Alberto Fernández decidió dejarlo sin efecto. Según el Decreto 103/2019, la medida partirá del 1 de enero y el aumento se suspendió hasta el 1 de febrero de 2020. En el caso de YPF, el precio de un litro de Super Naftha iba a costar casi $ 56, mientras que la prima era Ir a rodear los $ 64 en Buenos Aires. Que contiene el aumento, que finalmente dio reversa, estima que la demora en los precios que redondean el 10% es persiste. 1 de diciembre, se produjo el último aumento, despué , tras publicar una actualización del impuesto a los combustibles en el Boletín Oficial. Antes, noviembre ya había tenido dos aumentos más al inicio y en el medio del mes con el fin de actualizar el precio por el congelamiento dispuesto por Mauricio Macri.

text1: Los conservadores presionan para abrir todo el espectro de 6 GHz sin licencia Varios grupos conservadores están presionando a la FCC para que libere espectro en la banda de 6 GHz, diciendo que está infrautilizado y que los riesgos para los titulares son exagerados. La comisión bajo el presidente de la FCC, Ajit Pai, ha propuesto permitir el intercambio dinámico de la banda entre los titulares, incluidos los usuarios y servicios públicos de ENG de transmisión con licencia, y los usuarios sin licencia. Relacionado: Broadcast, Cable Square Off Over 6 GHz "Al abrir la banda de 6 GHz para uso sin licencia, la FCC permitiría una innovación tecnológica masiva al designar una porción altamente infrautilizada del espectro de radio para un uso más amplio y eficiente", escribieron Ajit Pai el viernes. (14 de febrero). Abrieron la carta con una especie de San Valentín para el presidente, diciendo que bajo su liderazgo el país podría "ver pronto una tremenda banda tecnológica ENG. Los grupos conservadores están claramente en el campo anterior". Aunque algunos usuarios titulares del espectro de 6 GHz pintan una panorama sombrío y temible de compartir este espectro, la tecnología ya en uso con éxito puede permitir la coexistencia en la banda.
text2:
Rapporto: Pai chiede ai fornitori di banda larga uno sforzo concertato per il coronavirus
Il presidente della FCC Ajit Pai ha esortato i fornitori di servizi Internet a ridurre i costi e aumentare la velocità, dato che è probabile che il coronavirus porti più persone online a lavorare, studiare e ottenere assistenza sanitaria, secondo il Wall Street Journal.

Ciò è avvenuto in teleconferenza con rappresentanti del settore giovedì (12 marzo).

Un portavoce della FCC ha confermato le chiamate, così come una fonte che le conosceva, e ha affermato che venerdì sarebbero stati pubblicati ulteriori dettagli.

Pai vuole che i provider di banda larga tengano a bada le disconnessioni, forniscano agevolazioni per la fatturazione e aprano gratuitamente hot spot WiFi.

Comcast ha anticipato la questione giovedì, annunciando che stava offrendo 60 giorni di accesso gratuito a banda larga alle case a basso reddito, fornendo attrezzature gratuite e aumentando la velocità.

Inoltre, la NCTA-The National Cable & Telecommunications Association, ha affermato giovedì che i suoi membri stanno esplorando modi per espandere le iniziative e sviluppare nuove strategie per soddisfare il momento.

text1:
Horario escolar en casa: Cómo mantener a tus hijos concentrados en casa
La semana pasada, el primer ministro Boris Johnson anunció que las escuelas cerrarán para todos los niños, excepto para los trabajadores clave. Las escuelas aún deberán cuidar a los hijos de los trabajadores clave, como el personal del NHS, los trabajadores de los supermercados y los oficiales de policía, así como a los niños vulnerables, pero todos los demás niños ahora deben ser educados en el hogar.

El Primer Ministro también anunció que los exámenes no se llevarán a cabo como de costumbre en mayo y junio.

Cuando se le preguntó sobre la duración del cierre de las escuelas, Johnson dijo que quiere mantenerlo en un "mínimo absoluto".

Todavía no está claro cuándo se reabrirán las escuelas debido a las medidas en curso para minimizar el impacto de COVID-19.
text2:
Coronavirus: Body Coach's Joe Wicks to hold live daily PE lessons for kids
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Sign up to FREE email alerts from Mirror - The Coronavirus Briefing Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Invalid Email

The Body Coach Joe Wicks has announced he will be holding live daily PE lessons for kids to help keep children fit and healthy while they are not at school during the coronavirus pandemic.

Joe made his "exciting announcement" earlier today and said that with all schools now closed after today he was going to become the "nation's PE teacher".

The 30 minute workout sessions are aimed at "little kids right up to secondary school".

(Image: Getty Images)

Joe vowed he would get children "moving, feeling energised, positive, optimistic."

Announcing the workouts which will start on Monday at 9am and will be held ever weekday, Joe said: "I'm going to do a live workout called 'PE With Joe' on my YouTube channel The Body CoachTV.

"It's a workout designed specifically for kids because when the school are closed there is no PE. Don't worry, I've got you. I'm going to take this over.

"I'm going to get your kids moving, feeling energised, positive, optimistic.

"So tune in Monday morning at 9am and every day.

"It's a 30 minute session for little kids right up to secondary school. Get involved, have fun.

"We're going to be doing loads of basic exercise.

"You don't need a lot of room. I'm going to take care of it. This is happening. I am going to be the nation's PE teacher."

text1:
Fürstenfeldbruck: Das Kastanienwunder von der Feuerhausstraße
Nach Beschädigung im November

Von Ingrid Zeilinger schließen

Dass diese Kastanie in der Feuerhausstraße in Fürstenfeldbruck wieder blüht, grenzt fast an ein Wunder.

Fürstenfeldbruck - Der Baum in der Feuerhausstraße wurde bei Bauarbeiten auf dem Nachbargrundstück im vergangenen November stark beschädigt. Auch die Krone musste stark gestutzt werden. Doch offenbar hat die Kastanie all diese Beschädigungen ausgehalten und überlebt. Denn jetzt steht sie im Frühling in voller Blüte – zur Freude der Bauarbeiter und Anwohner.

+ So sah der Baum noch im November aus © Weber

Weitere Nachrichten aus dem Landkreis finden Sie hier.
text2: Take your bruck home with you, amenity trust warns - The Shetland Times People are being encouraged, now more than ever, to take their litter home with them. Bruck at the Peerie Voe at Spiggie. Shetland Amenity Trust, which runs Da Voar Redd Up and the Dunna Chuck Bruck campaign, said it was important both to keep Shetland tidy and to protect those who pick up litter. With the slight easing of lockdown at the weekend and the glorious weather more people had been visiting our beaches and outdoor spaces, the trust said. In some places that has given rise to more litter being left behind, ranging from beer cans to dog poo bags left hanging on fence posts. Disposable plastic gloves, used tissues and face masks had also been spotted on roadsides and pavements. The trust is asking people to take course to wash their hands. Ms Middleton added: “For those who continue to drop litter and to leave their dog poo bags behind, you are asked to take it home with you and stop ruining our environment and putting those who care for it at risk.

text1: 世卫组织应如何指导传染病暴发期间的获取和利益共享？摘要 为应对主要影响几内亚、塞拉利昂和利比里亚的 2013-2016 年埃博拉病毒病 (EVD) 疫情，世界卫生组织 (WHO) 制定了管理传染病爆发中的伦理问题的指南，其中包括社会距离、研究在爆发环境和临床护理中。本文评估了该指南关于在传染病暴发期间研究和长期储存生物标本的建议，并认为该指南没有为响应者、研究人员和组织的行动提供足够的指导。它借鉴了 2013-2016 年再次发生的埃博拉病毒病的经验教训，考虑了当地人在疫情爆发后从研究中获得的好处以及为疫情做好准备。 9 效用、公平、正义和自由的基本道德原则是广泛而受实际关注的影响，但它们提供了将生命科学的好处带给受影响人群的路线图
text2: 使实验性疫苗的紧急使用更安全抽象在人道主义紧急情况下部署实验性疫苗的伦理和后勤挑战因缺乏安全性和有效性数据而加剧。对于由高死亡率和很少治疗的病原体引起的爆发，例如埃博拉病毒病，不提供具有某些有效证据的实验性疫苗也可能在伦理上受到怀疑。本文建议 (1) 收集更多关于实验性疫苗安全性的临床前数据，以及 (2) 改善研究基础设施，以使受影响社区的广泛受试者能够参与长期试验。推动这些目标将有助于更清晰地定义人口脆弱性和风险可接受性。疾病风险与实验性疫苗接种风险 安全有效的疫苗接种计划对于缓解疾病暴发至关重要，但疫苗部署问题可以通过将脆弱性和紧急情况的定义置于上下文中来帮助解决；准备；与容易再次爆发疫情的当地社区的人们建立持续和可持续的伙伴关系，包括通过建立信任的沟通；并投资于研究基础设施

text1:
Gustine CA arrestato con l'accusa di percosse sessuali
Un uomo di 37 anni Gustine è stato arrestato martedì dopo che la polizia ha detto di aver palpato un membro della famiglia adolescente nel suo letto.

La vittima di 17 anni ha detto alla polizia che Ruben Lucio Flores Jr. è salito sul suo letto, ha afferrato il suo corpo mentre era eccitato, ha detto il dipartimento di polizia di Gustine in una dichiarazione pubblicata online.

La presunta vittima ha denunciato l'incidente alle 6:36 di martedì. Lucio Flores è stato arrestato entro un'ora, ha detto la polizia.

È stato ammonito nella prigione della contea di Merced con l'accusa di percosse sessuali, un reato. Non era elencato come detenuto mercoledì mattina.
text2: Incendi boschivi nell'East Gippsland: i residenti del fiume Cann scortati fuori Luke McCrone ha girato questo video di suo fratello e suo suocero che combattono un incendio in una casa sulla Terra Nova Drive a Mallacoota Questo pomeriggio un convoglio di auto e autobus sarà condotto fuori dall'isolata Cann River, che rimane senza elettricità, in vista di pericolose condizioni di incendio nei prossimi giorni. Un avviso inviato alle persone nella zona e letto all'Herald Sun, ha detto che i residenti potrebbero trasferirsi a Orbost, a circa 70 km a ovest lungo la Princes Highway. "Se desideri trasferirti da Cann River a Orbost a causa del pericolo di incendio, puoi farlo oggi in autobus o in convoglio nel tuo veicolo", si legge nell'avviso. Warren Fenner, di W&J Fenner Logging, ha lavorato insieme al personale del Dipartimento per la terra, l'acqua e la pianificazione e gli appaltatori dell'industria del legno per sgomberare le strade intorno a Can. “I miei servizi erano migliori con l'attrezzatura. Ho fiducia nelle altre persone che si prendono cura della mia famiglia". Ha aggiunto: “Ero con la mia famiglia gialla e ciò di cui hai bisogno quando c'è un incendio è la famiglia Caterpillar (attrezzatura).

text2:
Burger King responds to coronavirus pandemic by offering free kids meals
article

Burger King will start offering free kids meals at their US restaurants.

This announcement comes as several cities and states have told restaurants to close their dining rooms and only fulfill take-out and delivery orders. At the same time, many school districts across the country have either closed or started teaching students online, which has caused problems for families who rely on school lunches to feed their children.

Burger King restaurants in the United States will start offering two free kids meals for one adult meal, Bloomberg reports. The offer will reportedly be available for orders placed through the restaurant's online or mobile apps.

Jose Cil, CEO of Burger King's parent company, Restaurant Brands International Inc., discussed the new offer on Tuesday after participating in a conference call with President Trump. The call included other restaurant leaders and was focused on the coronavirus pandemic's effect on the restaurant industry.

According to Bloomberg, Cil said, "We work closely with each of our franchisees. We’re going to get through this. We have a strong franchise system and a very strong franchise model.”

Cil also said that the company was working with its franchisees on a case-by-case basis to determine whether to provide aid.

Burger King isn't the only company making changes amid the coronavirus pandemic.

Advertisement

DoorDash, a restaurant delivery app, recently announced several changes to their policies to limit the amount of contact customers make with restaurant workers and delivery drivers. The company also announced that they would be waiving commission fees for pick-up orders for restaurants already using the service.

Get updates on this story from FOX News

text2:
Haiti’s leader marks independence day amid security concerns
PORT-AU-PRINCE, Haiti — Haitian President Jovenel Moïse broke with tradition on Wednesday and celebrated the country’s independence day in the capital for security reasons following months of political turmoil.

Moïse, whose government has been accused of corruption, denounced graft during his speech at the National Palace in Port-au-Prince and urged Haiti’s elite to work with the government and help create employment.

“We’re still extremely poor,” he said. “Those who continue to get rich find it normal that they do not pay taxes, find it normal that there can be no competition, find it normal that they set prices for consumers, especially when this consumer is the state itself.”

Moïse also apologized for the country’s ongoing power outages and renewed his 2016 campaign pledge to provide electricity 24 hours a day, saying it was harder to accomplish than he imagined.

The speech that marked the 216th anniversary of the world’s first black republic was originally slated to take place in the northern coastal town of Gonaives, where Jean-Jacques Dessalines declared Haiti’s independence. But the town, like many others, was hit by violent protests that began in September amid anger over corruption, fuel shortages and dwindling food supplies as opposition leaders and supporters demanded the resignation of Moïse. More than 40 people have been killed and dozens injured.

Large-scale protests in Port-au-Prince have since dissipated, although smaller ones are still occurring elsewhere in the country. On Wednesday, opposition leaders and supporters gathered in Gonaives to attend the funeral of an anti-government protester and then carried his coffin through the streets as more protesters joined them.

text1: 在全国民主联盟政权下，言论自由仍然难以捉摸但随着执政的全国民主联盟进入第五个也是最后一个任期，随着人们因说出自己的想法而被告上法庭并入狱，乐观情绪已变成苦涩和沮丧。人权活动人士说，缅军（军事）军政府用来压制个人自由的法律仍然被军方和文职官员广泛使用。权利倡导者称限制言论自由的法律包括《电信法》第 66(d) 条、《保护公民隐私和安全法》、《刑法》第 505(a) 和 (b) 条以及第 124(a) 条法典，以及《和平集会与和平游行法》。言论自由组织 Athan 表示，通过废除限制言论和表达自由的法律，超过 250 人被监禁或被指控违反限制言论自由的法律。但政府和议会都没有表现出任何关注这些要求的迹象，因为这两个机构都在努力在个人自由和集体责任之间寻求平衡。 - 翻译
text2:
Martha's Garden: First Hill Gardens were resurrected during 2019 gardening season
2019 was a busy gardening season as Martha's Garden "took on" the old Arrows restaurant gardens that are a couple miles from the center of Ogunquit. The restaurant is now an event destination called First Hill Gardens.

The numerous garden beds were covered in plastic or tarps in all stages of disintegration. Weeds had grown into the beds and irrigation tapes, cinder blocks, rebar and plastic trellis were strewn about. Four seasons of abandonment enabled the weeds to spread and the sun did a mighty fine job of breaking down some of the plastic covers.

To keep one's head above water, one bed at a time was focused upon. A quick peek under a tarp let this gardener know if the weeds were still out of control or if there was a possibility that the bed could be brought easily to life. Spring planting of potatoes and asparagus had to begin and by golly, a couple beds just had to be planted. So the work of transforming began - one garden bed at a time.

The task of lugging cinder blocks and gravel bags (disintegrating also!) began. Then the peeling back of the tarp and letting the earth underneath take a breath of spring air. No worms were visible, but soil that had received compost over the previous years was intact and it looked good! Figuring out the wild irrigation hoses and tapes was challenging, but in the end most were removed due to possible sun damage; other tapes were salvaged, tied up and stored. Raking and pulling weeds, tilling, spreading compost and soil amendments commenced. Then transplanting and mulching the asparagus babies and seed potatoes came next. Getting those beds planted was a major breakthrough; now the gardening season was really underway.

Bed, after bed. Day, after day. A small work party of six people attacked the 36 rotting cold frames and in threehours hauled them away. These naturally raised beds were kept as is and planted with flowers and vegetables. There was a path tilled down the middle and salt marsh hay was used as a mulch, over burlap in the paths. I was so sick of plastic and was/am trying to limit buying items made from or in plastic. I made a pledge that the First Hill Gardens were going to be natural and organic with limited use of plastic. It is challenging and I do understand why farmers and larger scale gardeners use plastic mulch, etc. I experimented with two types of burlap for weed control and the outcome is that the weave of the burlap has to be tight, with heavy warp and weft. Then doubling or tripling the fabric pretty much helps smother weeds. I am resorting to a heavy/deep mulch using only salt marsh hay with no burlap this coming season. Salt marsh hay has relatively no weed seed in it and looks and feels wonderful.

Some days I did have help with edging, hauling heavy cinder blocks and weeding, and couldn't have managed without the help of my son and daughter. They were amazing! Persistence paid off and a beautiful overall garden evolved. Parsley, arugula, onions, marigolds, tomatoes, peppers, dahlias, corn, beans, strawflowers, amaranth, tulsi and peas grew despite damage from the pesty deer. Tobacco Hornworm and Japanese Beetles were in abundance - I think I picked 80 hornworms off the tomato plants and beetles loved the marigold flowers and roses. Having the earth worms reappear, plus Monarch butterflies and honeybees, was so gratifying and a wonderful gift. Birds, turkeys and, yes, deer, all showed up and life was teeming at First Hill Gardens this past 2019 gardening season. Looking forward to 2020 and the amazing possibilities in the garden beds at First Hill.

I will "leaf" you with the following: a vision, persistence and hard work thrown together can move mountains or at least weeds on your dirt pathway of life. Happy New Year!

�

text1: 4 月至 9 月，流入印度的外国直接投资增长 15% 至 260 亿美元 外国直接投资、外国直接投资流入、印度经济、纳伦德拉·莫迪政府、DPIIT、营商便利性根据政府数据，本财年的一半。 2018-19 年 4 月至 9 月期间外国直接投资 (FDI) 流入量为 226.6 亿美元。在 2019-20 年 4 月至 9 月期间吸引最大外资流入的行业包括服务业（44.5 亿美元）、计算机软件和硬件（40 亿美元）、电信（42.8 亿美元）、汽车（21.3 亿美元）和贸易（21.4 亿美元），工商部数据显示。在本财年上半年，新加坡继续成为印度最大的外国直接投资来源，投资额达 80 亿美元。随后外国投资进入该国没有受到影响。另请阅读：联合国报告称，2018 年流入印度的外国直接投资增长 6% 至 420 亿美元 另请阅读：印度最大的避税天堂中外国直接投资的主要贡献者：报告
text2:
FDI rises 15% to $26 billionin April-Sept.
Foreign direct investment into India grew close to 15% to $26 billion during the first half of the current financial year, according to government data.

Inflow of foreign direct investment (FDI) during April-September of 2018-19 stood at $22.66 billion.

Sectors that attracted maximum foreign inflows during April-September 2019-20, include services ($4.45 billion), computer software and hardware ($4 billion), telecommunications ($4.28 billion), automobile ($2.13 billion) and trading ($2.14 billion), the Commerce and Industry Ministry data showed.

Singapore continued to be the largest source of FDI in India during the first half of the financial year, with $8 billion investments.

text1: NASA'dan 240 bin liralü ödüllü 'uzay tuvaleti' yarışması  Artemis Projesi kapsamında, NASA, 2024 yılına kadar Moon'a insanlı bir görevi yerine getirmeyi planlayarak, astronotları kullanacak tuvaletin tasarım yarışmasına başladı.Dolar (yaklaşık 240 bin TL) açıkladı.NASA'dan yapılan açıklama, dünyanın ayındaki yerçekimin, dünyanın yerçekiminin yaklaşık altıısından dolayı dünyanın yerçekiminin yaklaşık altı altındığı ve tuvaletlerin ay yerçekiminde çalışmaları ve mikroda çalışmaları istendiği vurgulandı.-Gravitasyonel çevre.Tuvalet Yarışması'nın Proje Yöneticisi Mike Interbartolo, "Bu kesinlikle görevin ana odak noktası değil. Ay'a söyleyeceğiz, bu yüzden Aya'ya aya söyleyebiliriz. Geçtiğimiz aylarda astronot adayını başarıyla bitirerek mezun oldu.Program. SA, son aylarda, aya basılacak ilk kişinin bir astronot grubuy olduğunu açıklad  kimliği tespit edilmişti. Bu kişi olan mezun altı kişi arasından seçilebileceği belirtiliyor. Astronotlar 2024 yapımında kullanılması insanlı Ay görevinde ve 30'lu yaşamdan önce ilk insanlı Mars görevinde yer alacak.
text2: NASA'nın 2024'te Ay'a insan hedefi 2 yıl geciktirebilir NASA, genel denetim ofisi tarafından hazırlanmış ve web sitesinde yayınlanan, NASA'nın Artemis görevi altında gerçekleştirilen maliyet ve teknik aksaklıklarla mücadele ettiği alan başlatma sistemi (uzay başlatma sistemi-SLS) programı., kaydedildi.Raporda, SLS'yi geliştirmek ve oluşturmak için ana eleman sözleşmelerinin her biri, 2 milyar dolarlık maliyet aşımına ve en az 2 yıllık program gecikmelerine neden olan çok sayıda teknik zorluk ve performans problemidir."İfadeler kullanıldı. İfadelere dahil edildi. 2028 yılına kadar düzenlenmeyi hedefleyen, bir uzay aracının organizasyonunu, Mars için bir uzay gemisinin organizasyonunu hedefledi. mesis uçuşlarının ardından Ay yörüngesinde bir uzay istasyonunun ve buradanın olarak Mars'a insanlı seferlerin planlanmasının hedeflendiği açık ölümlü olarak. NASA EFSANEVİ FOTOĞRAFI GÜNCELLEDİ

text1: Aktualności RMF FM: Zaśrodki środków alarmowych bombowych w zeszłorocznych matur stoją rosyjskie specsłużby  Za serią fałszywych alarmów bombowych podczas zeszłorocznych egzaminów matrycowych są rosyjskie specyfikacje. Ponieważ RMF FM dochodzeniowych reporterów dowiedział się, są to ustalenia pierwszego planu polskich badaczy badających ten atak internetowy. Przypomnijmy o tym, że podczas egzaminów matowych e-maile z zagrożeniami osiągnęły prawie 700 szkół w całej Polsce. Policja w przed i lo w Rzeszowie / Dariusz Delmanowicz / Papnidał wskazuje na Rosjan w oparciu o szczegółową analizę połączeń internetowych. Dokładnie badanie treści e-maili z fałszywymi informacjami prowadzono przez naszych ekspertów na serwerach zlokalizowanych w Sankt Petersburgu. Zainstalowano, że był ckiego. Twierdzi też, że wciąż nie jesteśmy w stanie, w którym wyprzedziło się zareagowanie na takie szkolenie. Tym bardziej - jak dodał - że podzielili się, to światowi liderzy w tym wspólnotowym sprzęcie
text2: Alarmy bombowe podczas ubiegłorocznych matur. Robota Rosjan  Początkowo podejrzenie spadło na uczniów, a nawet dla Polskiego Stowarzyszenia Nauczków, a następnie spór konfliktowany z rządem z sporem do podnoszenia wynagrodzenia. Badacz ustalił, że fałszywe alarmy były dziełem rosyjskich specyfikacji - pisze RMF FM.Zaktywowanie treści e-maili Polaków uderzyły w ślad serwerów w Sankt St. Petersburg, który został założony, były już używane do wysyłania niepokojących treści do innych krajów . Nawet autorzy całej działań zostały ustalone. Nadawców e-maili zostały zalogowane na kontach używanych przez rosyjski wywiad - Gru. Szef agencji wywiadowczej Grzegorz Małecki mówi, że zeszłoroczne ataki podczas baccalareate spojrzeć na element działań hybrydowych, które prowadzi Rosja, między innymi wobec Polsk  Istot ich jest, że one są poniżej progu wojny, progu konfliktu zbrojnego, w związku z tym możemy to traktować w ramach agresji na państwo - mówi Małecki, cytowany przez RMF FM.

text1: Destaca Salud Coahuila trabajo de sus colaboradores  Escuchar Nota: "Somos el estado pionero para firmar un acuerdo de colaboración con el Consejo General de Salubridad para certificar la totalidad de nuestros hospitales generales y centros de salud", agregó. "También comenzó el sistema de videollamadas, lo que nos permitió servir a 3 mil 600 informes y, por lo tanto, reducir el empleo de la ambulancia en un 48 por ciento", dijo. "Tienes que ser claro, la salud es un tema que exige de cada uno de nosotros la atención. 365 días del año. La Secretaría de Salud es una dependencia altamente comprometida de las familias de Coahuilenses, por esa razón, mantenemos servicios oportunos de salud y trabajamos para aumentar su calidad ", dijo el titular de la salud del estado." Mantenemos una estrecha comunicación con nuestros sindicatos y con El personal de ver cuáles son sus principales preocup fatizó que los Consejos de Prevención y Atención al Sobrepeso y Obesidad, contra el Suicidio y Atención a Embarazos Adolescentes, han logrado resultados satisfactorios gracias al trabajo del especialista personal en cada uno de los temas.
text2: Fortalecerá Salud Coahuila en 2020 cirugías de mínima invasión  Escuchar Nota "Es una prioridad elevar la calidad de los servicios de salud y contribuir a la recuperación temprana de nuestros pacientes".Confirmó que este año se fortalecerá el programa de cirugías de invasión mínima que se realiza en los hospitales generales.Para el proceso de reingeniería del sector de la salud impulsado por el gobernador Miguel Ángel Riquelme Solís, las habitaciones de la sala de operaciones han sido equipadas con recursos estatales y federales para realizar procedimientos quirúrgicos de alto nivel."Hemos entrenado a nuestro equipo médico y la enfermería con el uso de nuevos equipos para llevar a cabo operaciones de manera más eficiente", dijo, recordó que durante 2019 se realizaron casi 100 millones de pesos, donde se llevaron a cabo cirugías metabólicas.Estamos en el proceso de certificación del Consejo General de Salubrida  millones de pesos en, donde se realizaron las cirugías metabólicas. Los nosocomios se encuentran en proceso de certificación por parte del Consejo de Salubridad General, por lo que estos beneficios podrán ofrecerse en las 8 jurisdicciones sanitarias.

text1: Gizemli salgın binlerce insana bulaştı Aralık ayında Çin'in Wuhan kentinde bu virüsten etkilenen 2 kişi ölmüştü. bunun üzerine Singapur ve Hong Kong, Wuhan'dan hava yoluyla gelen yolcularda tarama yapmaya başladı, Amerikalı yetkililer de San Francisco, Los Angeles ve New York havalimanlarında Cuma gününden itibaren benzer tarama uygulamaları başlatacaklarını duyurdu. ÇIN DIŞINDA Kİ ÜLKELERDE DE GÖRÜLDÜ Virüsün çıkış noktası Çin'in Wuhan şehri. Ama Tayland'da iki ve Japonya'da da virüsle bağlantılı bir vaka görüldü. uzmanlar, Wuhan'dan çıkan üç vakanın başka ülkelerde görülmesi, kayda geçirilenden çok daha fazla vaka olabileceğine işaret edebileceğini düşünüyor. Araştırmanın yayımlanmadan önce internete konan bulgularına göre hesaplamalar, virüsle bağlantılı yaklaşık 1.700 vaka olduğuna işaret ediyor. BOZUKe neden oluyor. Buna, SARS (ağır akut solunum yolu yetersizliği sendromu) deniyor. Çin'de 2002'de görülen SARS salgınında virüsün bulaştıüı 8.098 kişiden 774'ü ölmüştü
text2:
SON DAKİKA: ABD'yi corona virüsün ardından yeni bir tehlike daha bekliyor: İSTİLA!
Yeni tip corona virüsünün (Covid-19) merkez üssü ülkelerinden birisi olan ABD'den art arda son dakika haberleri geliyor. Ülkede vaka sayısı her saat başı artış gösterirken toplamda 598 bin 670'e ulaştı. Yetersiz önlemler ve sağlık kuruluşlarının da eksik kalması nedeni ile hayatını kaybedenlerin sayısı ise 25 bin 239'a çıktı. Corona virüsü ile baş etmeye çalışan ABD'de, New York ve Los Angeles gibi şehirlerde karantina uygulanıyor; ancak bu da beraberinde bir tehlikeyi getiriyor.

İSTİLA KAPIDA MI?

Amerikan NBC televizyonuna konuşan bir uzman, New York ve Los Angeles gibi karantina uygulanan şehirleri büyük bir tehlikenin beklediğini söyledi. Restoran ve kafe gibi işletmelerin kapalı olmasına dikkat çeken uzman isim, corona virüsü sırasında ve sonrasında ABD'nin bir istila ile karşı karşıya kalabileceğini belirtti. Uzman ismin sözleri sosyal medyada da en çok paylaşılan son dakika haberleri arasında öne çıktı.

İşte, o sözler ve ABD'yi bekleyen yeni tehlike;

text1: Murieron varios animales en un zoo alemán, por incendio causado por farolitos de Navidad Unos farolillos voladores son la causa más probable del incendio en un zoológico en la ciudad alemana de Krefeld (oeste) que acabó anoche con la vida de una treintena de animales del recinto de los monos, entre ellos cinco orangutanes, dos gorilas y un chimpancé, informó este miércoles la policía. En una rueda de prensa, el jefe de la policía de investigación criminal de Krefeld, Gerd Hoppmann, indicó que se ha abierto una investigación por incendio provocado por acción negligente después de que en la zona próxima al fuego se hallaran tres farolillos voladores de 34 centímetros de diámetro con mensajes en su interior escritos a mano con deseos para el nuevo año. Agregó que testigos dijeron haber visto en el aire a una altura muy baja este convencido de que reconstruir el recinto, que contaba con una superficie de 2.000 metros cuadrados, ya no costará solo los dos millones de marcos alemanes (un millón de euros) de 1975, sino unas decenas de millones de euros
text2: Más de 30 animales muertos por incendio en zoo de Alemania BERLÍN.- Un incendio en un zoológico del occidente de Alemania ocurrido en los primeros minutos de 2020 mató a más de 30 animales, entre ellos simios, monos, murciélagos y aves, informaron el miércoles las autoridades. Las linternas volantes lanzadas para celebrar el Año Nuevo pudieron haber sido la causa del incendio, agregó la policía. Varios testigos reportaron haber visto las linternas -cilindros de papel con una pequeña llama para calentar el aire de la linterna, que vuela en el cielo nocturno- poco después de la medianoche el miércoles cerca del zoológico Krefeld, dijo a la prensa Gerd Hoppmann, jefe de la policía penal de la ciudad. "La gente reportó ver esas linternas volando a baja altitud cerca del zoológico y luego comenzó a incendiarse", Krefeld y la mayoría de Alemania y pidió que las personas que las lanzaron o quienes los hayan visto acudan a la policía. El zoológico Krefeld abrió en 1975 y atrae a unos 400 mil visitantes cada año. Permanecerá cerrado el miércoles

text1: The 10 DR ecotourism attractions most visited by travelers in 2019 Because of the particular beauty that characterizes each of them, ten of the 128 protected areas that are part of the Natural Heritage of the Dominican Republic were the most visited by foreign and domestic tourists. From January to December 2019, visitors made their journeys and enjoyed the impressive biodiversity, recreation areas, landscapes, beaches, spas and mountains of those iconic places of the national territory. The first of these attractions was the Cotubanamá National Park followed by the natural monuments Loma Isabel de Torres and Cueva Los Tres Ojos, located in La Romana, Puerto Plata, and Santo Domingo East. In that sense, Ekers Raposo Peña, responsible for ecotourism and public use of the Ministry of Environment, explained that among the places sought by visitors are the natural monuments Catalina Island (La Romana), Salto de la and pre-Hispanic cultural values that are a permanent attraction of ecological tourism, its route covers Saona Island, the Catuano Channel, Punta Aljibe and Punta Balajú and Bahía de las Calderas, according to El Día
text2: Editorial: Resolving for change – Vernon Morning Star Broken your New Year’s resolution yet? Yes, we’re only a few hours into the new decade, but let’s face it, many people have already failed to meet the goals they set for themselves. If you’re one of them, don’t worry, you’ll have lots of company. One reason people fail to achieve those lofty New Year’s resolutions is the “lofty” part; they’ve set that bar where it’s just too far out of reach. Year after year, the top 10 list of resolutions looks much the same: Exercise more, lose weight is always up there, as are the money-related resolutions. It’s in a good cause, for sure. Improving yourself is always important. But most people don’t manage to make those drastic changes, especially at a stressful time of year, while suffering the making a better world. READ MORE: SilverStar to ring in new year with a pow READ MORE: B.C.’s top local news stories of 2019 @VernonNews letters@vernonmorningstar.com Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter

text1: Ruhiger Jahreswechsel, aber Blaulicht vor dem Schwerter Marienkrankenhaus  Blaues Licht schimmerte an der Fassade des Marienkrankenhaus und des Notfahrzeugs und des Notfahrzeugs und der Krankenwagen stand vor dem Gebäude. Um Mitternacht wurde hier der Feueralarm geschlagen. Die Verwendung hat sich jedoch schnell als Fehlalarm erwiesen. "Wir müssen einen solchen Fall wie eine echte Marke behandeln", betonte Ralf Jürgens am Mittwoch aus der Schwerterfeuerabteilung. Die Feuerwehrleute und Frauen mussten jedoch nicht ausziehen, weil es ein Fehlalarm war. Am Westwall gab es Feuer auf einem Balkon. © Heiko Mühlbauernahue Zur gleichen Zeit wurde ein Feuer auf einem Balkon an der Westwall entdeckt. Die Feuerwehr musste dort eine Leiter betreten, da die Bewohner des Bodens offensichtlich nicht zu Hause waren. Das Feuer wurde dann schnell gelöscht, also die Feuerwehr. Träumte in der Nacht-Müllstimmun Mal traf es die Haltestelle Am Buschkampsweg in Geisecke. Die Feuerwehr fegte am Neujahrstag die Scherben zusammen und füllte sie. Insgesamt sei es aber ein sehr ruhiger Jahreswechsel gewesen, so Feuerwehrmann Jürgens.
text2: Proteste: Zwischenfälle bei Silvesterfeiern in Hongkong  Mit den Neujahrsabendzeremonien in Hongkong ist es in der Nacht zum Vorfall gekommen. Radikale Aktivisten warfen die Brandraten und blockierte Straßen. Die Polizei ging mit Wasserfenster, Tränengas und Pfefferspray. Im Vergleich zu den Weihnachtstagen waren jedoch weniger Menschen gegen die Regierung auf der Straße von Protest gegangen. An diesem Neujahrstag wird eine größere Demonstration erwartet, die auch der Polizei erlaubt war. Die Organisatoren der Zivilrechtsfront hatten in den letzten Monaten in den letzten Monaten in Chinas speziellen Verwaltungsregionen in Chinas bereits mehrere wichtige erhebliche Demonstrationen gemacht. . Sie fordern echte Demokratie und mehr Selbstbestimmung. Seit der Rückkehr 1997 nach China wird Hongkong nach dem Prinzip von "einem Land, zwei Systemen" autonom regiert. Die sieben Millionen Hong-Konger genießen - im Gegensatz zu Menschen in der Volksr  hier mit Freunden und getroffen hatte erwartet, ein Feuerwerk zu sehen, und ich bin enttäuscht, sehe auch den Grund nicht, warum es abgesagt wurde." Die Proteste haben ohnehin schon zu einer starken Verringerung der Zahl an Touristen geführt.

text1:
Zum 33. Geburtstag: Das Beste aus 15 Jahren Messi
Es war der 16.10.2004. Der große FC Barcelona trat auswärts im Derby gegen Stadtrivalen Espanyol Barcelona an. In der 82. Minute, beim Stand von 1:0 für die „Blaugrana“ nahm Barca-Coach Frank Rijkaard den Torschützen Deco vom Platz und verhalf einen 17-jährigen Argentinier namens Lionel Messi zu seinem Debüt. Der Rest ist Geschichte: Messi entwickelte sich zu einem der größten Fußballspieler der Geschichte, zum wahrscheinlichen besten Spieler der jemals für Barcelona auflief und verzückte seine Fans über Jahre hinweg mit atemberaubenden Toren und Highlights. Anlässlich seines 33. Geburtstags finden Sie hier (siehe Video oben) das Beste aus seinen 15 Jahren in Spanien.
text2:
21st Austria weekly - Foreign trade statistics (31/12/2019)
Regional foreign trade: In the first half year of 2019, seven out of nine Austrian federal states registered increases on the export side, according to preliminary results by Statistics Austria. The federal states Vienna (+7.8%) and Styria (+7.6%) realised the highest relative increases. In absolute terms, Styria (+Euro 0.94 bn), Vienna (+Euro 0.75 bn) and Upper Austria (+Euro 0.74 bn) showed the strongest gains. Carinthia (-4.3% or - Euro 0.17 bn) and Lower Austria (-1.8% or - Euro 0.21 bn) registered a decline compared to the previous period. On the import side, Styria (+6.4% or + Euro 0.61 bn), Lower Austria (+5.7% or +Euro 0.74 bn) and Vorarlberg (+4.2% or + Euro 0.16 bn) recorded the strongest relative increases compared to the previous half year. text1: New Series “The Walking Dead: World Beyond” Will No Longer Arrive This April Two-season limited event series “The Walking Dead: World Beyond” had been set to premiere April 12th on AMC, but we’ve learned this week that the premiere has been delayed. The new spinoff series, which tells the story of the first generation to come-of-age in the apocalypse, will now be arriving on AMC “later this year.” We have no new date at this time. According to Deadline, the series “had wrapped filming but was in post-production on the last few episodes, which has been impacted by the COVID-19-related company closures.” Filming on “The Walking Dead” and “Fear the Walking Dead” is also on hold. In “World Beyond”... “Some will become heroes. Some will become villains. In, living and undead on an important quest. Pursued by those who wish to protect them and those who wish to harm them, a tale of growing up and transformation unfurls across dangerous terrain, challenging everything they know about the world, themselves and each other.
text2: ‘The Walking Dead: World Beyond’ Premiere Postponed By AMC Amid Coronavirus Pandemic AMC has postponed the series premiere of The Walking Dead: World Beyond — the second spin-off in the popular zombie apocalypse franchise — due to coronavirus-related production shutdowns. Deadline reports that the series was initially set to premiere on April 12 but will now move to sometime “later this year.” The article confirms that while World Beyond has finished filming its first season, post-production on the last few episodes has been disrupted by production shutdowns due to the current pandemic. World Beyond joins several other television shows and films in being halted or delayed over the coronavirus outbreak. Season four of the critically-acclaimed FX series, Fargo, was also slated for an April premiere date but will now be pushed back. Anotheres films would also wind up delayed. “Why though? By the looks of it, it seems our quarantine might be extended. What better time for people to watch the new show when we’re all going to be home anyway?” asked one user
