text1: خروج متعافية من كورونا بمستشفى قها للحجر الصحي ليتزايد عدد المتعافين لـ77  قليوبيا - مستشفى نيفين طه المركزي في محافظة القليوبية، اليوم، انتعاش جديد، مقيم في محافظة منوفية، بعد انتعاشه من فيروس كورونا، لرفع عدد القضايا التي غادر المستشفى إلى 77 حالة على مدى الأيام الماضية. إن نهاية الفريق الطبي في حجر القهه، أن جميع الحالات في المستشفى مستقرة، وارتفع عدد التسويات إلى 77 شخصا، مشيرا إلى أن التسويات قررت اليوم تعمل على مسافة اثنين على التوالي واستردادها. شهد Kant مستشفى العزل في تشاو، محافظة القليوبية، التي تتلقى الموظفين الطبيين الجدد، اعتبارا من أمس وعلى مدار 14 يوما في منتصف الفرح والنشاط عن طريقهم، لخدمة الوطن والمرضى. "Kovid 19"، كان طاقمها السابق تماما وتتألف من 80 طبيبا، ورعاية التمريض والإدارة والعمال من أي إصابات بفيروسات بعد نتائج موظفي الموظفين، حيث تم إجلاء الطاقم الحالي المستشفى بعد 14 يوما، 1 بمجرد ظهورك في معرض للسيارات ، عليك أن تشجع على تشجيعك في المستقبل.
text2: شفاء 11 مصابا بـ كورونا فى مستشفى الحجر الصحي بقها أعلنت مستشفى قاها المركزية في القليوبية عن انتعاش 11 حالة مصابة بفيروس كورونا ومستشفىها يوم السبت بعد عينات سلبية، وعدد الحالات التي غادرت المستشفى لمدة 31 حالة في الأيام القليلة الماضية.تم تأكيد المستشفى في بيان صدر على موقع مستشفى كاها المركزي أعلن شفاء 20 شخصا الأسبوع الماضي أكثر من 3 مدفوعات بعد إثبات أن قضاياهم تحولت إلى سلبية.وزارة الصحة إلى أبناء المقاطعة لمواجهة فيروس كورونا.  ، بقسمي الرعاية المركزية الفائقة ، والأطباء مصطفى شلبي ، وأسماء دسوقي ، بقسم الأمراض النفسية ، والأطباء أحمد صلاح ، وأحمد عبد المولى ، بقسم الأمراض المتوطنة.

text1:
Właściciele włoskich kin domagają się zniesienia obowiązku noszenia maseczek
Kina we Włoszech nie zostaną otwarte w przewidzianym przez rząd terminie 15 czerwca, jeśli nie zostanie zniesiony wymóg noszenia maseczek - zapowiedziało w środę stowarzyszenie właścicieli sal kinowych. Uważają ten nakaz za niezrozumiały przy wymogu dystansu społecznego.

Stowarzyszenie zaprotestowało przeciwko zaleceniom dotyczącym warunków otwarcia kin po ponad trzech miesiącach przerwy. W ocenie branży kinowej są one zbyt surowe i nie dają szans na poprawę sytuacji tego sektora.

"Oczywiście poczyniono kroki naprzód, znosząc nakaz dystansu między członkami jednej rodziny, ale utrzymanie obowiązku użycia maseczki w sali kinowej jest niezrozumiałe" - głosi komunikat stowarzyszenia.

Przypomina się w nim, że w kinach obowiązywać ma zalecenie zachowania dystansu co najmniej jednego metra między widzami. Dlatego ponowiono apel o zmianę przepisów i wyrażenie zgody na to, aby w chwili zajęcia miejsca w kinie widzowie mogli zdjąć maseczki, tak, jak w przypadku klientów w restauracji.

Otwarcie kin 15 czerwca to jeden z ostatnich etapów łagodzenia restrykcji wprowadzonych we Włoszech w związku z pandemią.

Z Rzymu Sylwia Wysocka (PAP)

sw/ mal/
text2: An Italian expert has no doubts: Official data on the epidemic are not real The figures presented on the scale of the epidemic in Italy are "not real," said virologist Professor Roberto Burioni. In his opinion, a large sample of the population must be examined to obtain true data and, he added, "not to wander in the dark." In an interview published on Wednesday with a network of Italian local newspapers, Burioni stressed: "We need to know the extent of the epidemic." In his opinion, it is impossible to predict whether there will be a new wave of cases, for example at the turn of May and June. "We do not even know if when it is warm, the coronavirus transmits less, and this is the case with all pathogens attacking the respiratory system" - emphasized the Italian expert. Professor Roberto Burioni about those who have no symptoms and those who have not been tested for the presence of the virus. From Rzymu Sylwia Wysocka (PAP) Proven information on coronavrius available on the official government website: gov.p

text1: 喀拉拉邦 CM 推出 K-RERA 以提高房地产行业的透明度特里凡得琅（喀拉拉邦）[印度]，1 月 1 日（ANI）：为了增强客户的信心并提高房地产行业的透明度，首席部长 Pinarayi Vijayan 于周三在这里启动了喀拉拉邦房地产监管局 (K-RERA)。 “只是因为少数房地产经纪人偏离了良好的做法并沉迷于非法方式来铸币，整个行业有时会受到影响。我们听说过像房地产黑手党这样的术语，”维贾扬在官员中说启动事件。 “破坏市场的是少数人的贪婪。随着房地产监管局（RERA）的到位，将会有更多的透明度和可信度。这也将有助于重新定义房地产的发起人-买方关系。部门和快速解决纠纷。根据该法案，拥有超过 8 套公寓的建筑物和 500 平方米或以上土地的房地产项目必须在 RERA 注册。（ANI
text2:
K-RERA will ensure transparency: CM
The Kerala Real Estate Regulatory Authority (K-RERA) will help build trust in the real estate sector and infuse it with transparency and efficiency, Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan said on Wednesday.

The activities of a few individuals have served to malign this important sector to the extent that it has been equated to a ‘mafia,’ the Chief Minister said, formally inaugurating K-RERA at a function here.

With its emphasis on protecting the interests of consumers (buyers, allottees), K-RERA focusses on the prevention of malpractices in the real estate sector, he said.

Duping of buyers

Instances of buyers being duped by a section in the real estate sector had prompted the Parliament to pass the Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act in 2016 making it mandatory for all States to form RERAs. K-RERA is designed to prevent such malpractices in Kerala.

Realtors who function in a lawful manner will not find themselves inconvenienced by RERA, Mr. Vijayan said.

The real estate sector is integral to the development of land. Negative financial trends in real estate affects the economic sector as a whole.

If policies are favourable, the sector can grow. So it is important to have policies and approaches that do not weaken it.

While the sector has witnessed spectacular growth in the past few decades, the absence of an effective regulatory mechanism was the main reason for the problems associated with real estate sector.

“This is not a sector which should be equated to a ‘mafia’,” the Chief Minister said.

From Oct. 2019

Technically, K-RERA came into being in October last year with P.H. Kurian as chairman and Preetha P. Menon as member. The Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016, makes it compulsory for builders to register projects with the State-level RERA.

Real estate agents also need to get themselves with the authority. RERA registration is applicable to projects where the land to be developed is 500 square metres or more and the number of apartments is eight or more inclusive of all phases.

An adjudicating officer who will handle compensation claims and an appellate tribunal for handling appeals on K-RERA decisions will be appointed soon, the Chief Minister said. He issued the registration certificates to builders and real estate agents who registered with RERA. The Chief Minister also released the emblem of K-RERA on the occasion. Minister for Local Self Government A. C. Moideen presided. Additional Chief Secretary T.K. Jose, K-RERA chairman P. H. Kurian and member Preetha P. Menon spoke.

text1: El restaurante de Kelowna llevará a cabo una recaudación de fondos para un niño de un año con cáncer: Lake Country Calendar El evento está programado para el 25 de enero y contará con oportunidades para donaciones en efectivo The Central Kitchen and Bar en Kelowna ha preparado un evento, Burgers for Elara, en un esfuerzo para recaudar dinero para la familia Isagawa y su hija Elara, de un año, a quien le diagnosticaron un tumor en Nochebuena. El 31 de diciembre, Elara se sometió a una cirugía de 6,5 horas para extirpar el 98 por ciento del tumor entre la pelvis y el abdomen; sin embargo, Jessica Isagawa, miembro de la familia, dijo que Elara todavía tiene un largo camino hacia la recuperación por delante. “Después de reunirse con el equipo de oncología de Elara, se descubrió que el tumor de Elara es maligno y debe tratarse con hasta cuatro rondas de quimioterapia”, dijo Jessica. “Cada ronda de negocios locales. Para obtener más información, visite la página de Facebook de Central o la página del evento Burgers for Elara at Central. LEER MÁS: La familia de Kelowna casi alcanza la meta de recaudación de fondos para su hija diagnosticada con un tumor Denos Me gusta en Facebook y síganos en Twitter
text2:
Kelowna restaurant raises $10K for family with toddler battling cancer
A young Kelowna family who is seeking treatment for their one-year-old daughter’s cancer diagnosis has just received a hand up from a local business.

Currently living in Vancouver, The Isagawa's daughter Elara is undergoing chemotherapy at the BC Children’s Hospital.

With the costs of living away from home beginning to add up, Kelowna restaurant Central Kitchen and Bar decided to step in and host a fundraiser for the family this past weekend.

The ‘Burgers for Elara’ event welcomed hundreds to the eatery to join in on supporting the cause by either eating a burger dedicated to the tenacious toddler or by participating in the silent auction.

With 100% of the proceeds from the sales of the burger and silent auction going directly to the family, hungry patrons and generous donors were able to muster an incredible $10,000 for the Isagawa’s.

On Wednesday, Central owners Jared Lee and Devon Murray flew to Vancouver to deliver the incredible news and visit with the family.

According to Elara’s grandmother, Candace Chisholm, the restaurant saw tremendous support over the weekend, selling what she believed to be “hundreds of burgers.”

“We are blown away and humbled beyond belief,” said Chisholm on behalf of her son and daughter-in-law.

“Getting to see Jared and Devon was like getting an extra dose of love from home. We cannot thank these guys and the entire community that came out to support [the event] enough.”

Elara’s parents Nico and Jessica have always had a special connection with the restaurant, as it is where they had their first date and even had their engagement photos done, giving the impressive donation an even bigger impact.

“Central has always been a place that we have gone to feel at home,” added Chisholm. “They have truly become like family to us, and we thank them so much for the continued support as we get through Elara’s treatments."



If you were unable to attend the fundraiser at Central, but are still hoping to donate to the cause, a GoFundMe campaign has been set up for the family.

text1: LeBron James, Lakers suona nel 2020 dopo un ottimo inizio di stagione EL SEGUNDO — Per dare il benvenuto al prossimo decennio, i Lakers hanno perso il viola e l'oro per una notte, optando invece per abiti in cravatta nera. Erano dappertutto sui feed dei social media l'uno dell'altro, ballando e fumando sigari lunedì sera mentre LeBron James festeggiava il suo 35esimo compleanno. Poiché i Lakers giocano ai Phoenix Suns mercoledì sera, i festeggiamenti di Capodanno dovrebbero essere notevolmente attenuati. James ha detto che ha deciso solo tre giorni prima della grande serata che avrebbe organizzato una festa, cosa che sua moglie Savannah ha aiutato a organizzare durante la breve inversione di tendenza. Non era solo un compleanno, ma anche un cambio di pagina nell'anno. "Sono stato in grado di prendere due piccioni con una fava, portare lì i miei compagni di squadra, lo staff tecnico, la mia famiglia, i miei: "Abbiamo chiuso il 2019 in una buona posizione per continuare a migliorare e giocare a basket meglio a gennaio rispetto a dicembre .” pic.twitter.com/CZnJC3MsC6 — Los Angeles Lakers (@Lakers) 1 gennaio 202
text2: Dall'editore: Felice Anno Nuovo In questo periodo dell'anno è naturale sia riflettere che guardare avanti. Per noi di Packet guardiamo indietro a un anno di successi, poiché più persone che mai stanno leggendo ciò che scriviamo. Questa crescita è arrivata sulla nostra piattaforma digitale, thepacket.co.uk Alla fine del 2019, sul nostro sito web erano state lette più di cinque milioni di pagine, circa due milioni in più rispetto al 2018. Continuiamo ad avere un pubblico fedele anche sulla carta stampata e ringraziamo coloro che credono che il nostro giornalismo valga la pena pagare soldi per ogni settimana. Nel 2020 noi come testata giornalistica e, appunto, industria, continuiamo a lottare su più fronti. A parte la battaglia per assicurarsi gli introiti pubblicitari necessari per sopravvivere, uno che alza regolarmente la sua testa piuttosto brutta è il concetto di "notizie false". Questo è un termine che viene usato troppo spesso, di solito per esprimere sgomento per una storia puoi essere certo che è stata verificata prima di essere pubblicata. Grazie per il vostro supporto e vi auguro un felice anno nuovo. La colonna regolare dell'editore può essere letta ogni settimana nel Pacchetto, in vendita ogni mercoledì per 85 pence

text1: Neubrandenburg: Auseinandersetzung von Deutschen und Syrern: Staatsschutz ermittelt Die zunächst „unübersichtliche Schlägerei“ hat sich bereits am Montag ereignet. Avatar_prignitzer von Winfried Wagner 20. Februar 2020, 15:48 Uhr Nach einer Auseinandersetzung zwischen Syrern und Deutschen mit zwei Verletzten in Neubrandenburg hat der Staatsschutz die Ermittlungen übernommen. Wie eine Polizeisprecherin am Donnerstag sagte, hat sich die zunächst „unübersichtliche Schlägerei“ bereits am Montag ereignet. Nach bisherigen Ermittlungen soll eine 22-jährige, angetrunkene Neubrandenburgerin an einer Bushaltestelle aus einem Bus gestiegen und einen Syrer bespuckt haben. Die deutsche Frau habe den Mann ausländerfeindlich angeschrien und gegen seinen Kinderwagen mit einem dreijährigen Kind gestoßen. Daraufhin habe der 42 Jahre alte Mann die deutsche Frau geschlagen. Kurze Zeit später eskaliert die Situation Kurze Zeit später sei dernte eine medizinische Versorgung ab, wie es hieß. Sie bestreite zudem, dass sie den syrischen Mann provoziert habe. Sie habe angegeben, plötzlich grundlos von dem Mann geschlagen worden zu sein. Insgesamt habe die Polizei vier Anzeigen von beiden Parteien aufgenommen
text2: Stralsund: Schwerverletzter bei Messerangriff von Winfried Wagner/dpa 24. Mai 2020, 18:44 Uhr Ein 28-jähriger Mann soll bei einem Trinkgelage in Stralsund seinen Gastgeber bei einer Messerattacke schwer verletzt haben. Gegen den Tatverdächtigen, der am Sonntag am mutmaßlichen Tatort festgenommen wurde, besteht der Verdacht des versuchten Totschlages, wie ein Polizeisprecher am Sonntag in Neubrandenburg sagte. Der 52 Jahre alte Geschädigte habe mehrere Schnittverletzungen an Hals, Oberkörper und Hand sowie eine Stichverletzung am Oberkörper aufgewiesen. Er kam in eine Klinik. Lebensgefahr bestehe nicht. Das Motiv sei noch unklar. Nach Angaben der Polizei hatten sich die Männer am Samstagabend zum Trinken in der Wohnung des 52-Jährigen verabredet. Am Sonntagmorgen habe der Geschädigte eine Bekannte per Smartphone informiert, dass er schweregeschickt. Die Frau alarmierte die Beamten. Der mutmaßliche Täter sei schlafend in der Wohnung gefunden worden. Er werde an diesem Montag einem Haftrichter vorgeführt, hieß es. Zum Grad der Alkoholisierung und weiteren Hintergründen wurden keine Angaben gemacht

text1: Cuba en 2019: Carta Magna, tornado, rey, coyunturas... El 2019 no ha sido un año fácil para Cuba. Comenzó desde el principio con un devastador tornado en enero y continuó con un golpe al turismo con el fin de los cruceros y otras restricciones de viaje impuestas por Estados Unidos. Las dificultades económicas obligaron al Ejecutivo de Miguel Díaz-Canel a decretar en septiembre una alarmante “situación energética transitoria”, ya hacer malabarismos todo el año con medidas como la apertura de locales que vendan en dólares. Mientras tanto, la crisis de Ecuador y Bolivia puso fin a la cooperación sanitaria de la Isla en esas naciones y puso fin a los ingresos que generaba. La proclamación de la nueva Carta Magna, la celebración del medio milenio de La Habana, la visita de los reyes de España y el aumento del activismo más allá del gobierno, marcaron también la agenda informativa en la isla una escuela y un estilo cubano de representar a la ballet clásico de renombre mundial. “Cuando bailaba daba felicidad, alegría y, sobre todo, pensaba que daba vida, porque como la sintiera, la daría.
text2:
2019's Top U.S. Cannabis Stories: Vape Crisis, Industry Challenges, Landmark Legalization Moves & More
These are the headlines that dominated the cannabis industry in 2019 -- what can we expect in 2020?

January 1, 2020 6 min read

This story originally appeared on MJBizDaily



The U.S. cannabis industry experienced some momentous moves forward on the legalization front in 2019, but it also faced significant obstacles that reflected how the licensed marijuana sector is continuing to mature and why it cannot always expect boom times and unfettered growth.

The top page views of the year at Marijuana Business Daily show the industry’s interest in both sides of the coin. Among the most viewed stories of the year were those that focused on:

The vaping health scare.

Illinois’ historic move as it became the first state in the country to legalize retail sales through its Legislature and the 11th overall to approve adult use.

A key U.S. House committee’s approval of the Marijuana Opportunity Reinvestment and Expungement (MORE) Act.

California marijuana business headwinds such as those surrounding the illicit market and ongoing licensing barriers.

What follows is a rundown of MJBizDaily’s top stories of the year, as determined by the number of page views on the U.S. site.

RELATED: 20 Bold Predictions For The Cannabis Industry In 2020

1. Colorado’s Largest Cannabis Grower Loses Millions Of Dollars In Early Freeze: Supply Disruption Expected

Los Sueños Farms, which is based in Pueblo, Colorado -- and is the largest marijuana cultivator in the state -- revealed in October that it lost millions of dollars because of an early winter storm.

The industry braced for ripples throughout the cannabis supply chain in the state, reducing the amount of marijuana available to retailers and processors -- and meaning higher wholesale cannabis prices.

By December, however, Los Sueños’ owner reported the outdoor harvest was still better than 2018, and the company had ample material for the extraction market. The grower estimated it lost roughly $7 million from the freeze.

2. U.S. House Panel Passes Federal Cannabis Legalization Bill In Historic Vote

The Marijuana Opportunity Reinvestment and Expungement (MORE) Act of 2019 passed a vote by the U.S. House Judiciary Committee in November. If adopted into law, the measure could open up huge business opportunities for legal marijuana nationwide, similar to the federal legalization of hemp.

If the MORE Act does pass the full House in the 2020 election year, it still faces the huge obstacle represented by the Republican-controlled Senate.

3. UPS Sues California Cannabis Delivery Companies For Infringing On Trademark

Underlining why putting a moniker on a cannabis business isn’t as easy as it sounds, Atlanta-based United Parcel Service accused a group of California marijuana businesses -- United Pot Smokers, UPS420 and THCPlant -- of using names and logos that are “confusingly similar” to the package-delivery giant’s name and shield logo.

UPS also said the alleged infringement hurts its reputation through association with a marijuana company and further claimed the defendants have a reputation for offering “sham services” under the UPS mark and shield logo.

RELATED: 3 Lessons Entrepreneurs Can Learn From The Vaping Industry

4. Deaths, Illnesses Related To Vaping Cannabis On The Rise, Health Authorities Say

Concerns over marijuana vaping-related fatalities and illnesses began to dominate headlines in earnest in September as U.S. health officials urged people to stop vaping until it was determined why some consumers were coming down with serious breathing illnesses.

Now at the end of 2019, the worst days of the vaping crisis appear to be behind the legal cannabis industry as evidence mounted that products from the illicit market were mainly to blame.

The cannabis industry went on the offensive this year as marijuana businesses pushed to educate consumers about the importance of buying from the legal market.

5. Cannabis Industry Insiders Brace For Potential Fallout As Health Officials Report New Vaping Deaths

As news of the vape health crisis and related deaths spread, some in the cannabis industry expected at least a temporary drop in sales for products such as disposable vape cartridges, and that did come to pass.

The vape crisis hurt business in all recreational cannabis markets in the United States. And while vape sales moved up toward the end of the year in major markets, most have not yet fully recovered to where they were before.

6. 400-Plus California Marijuana Business Licenses Suspended, Injecting Fresh Uncertainty Into State’s Cannabis Industry

In 2020, the legal marijuana business in California is likely to get worse before it gets better. And that’s after an already challenging 2019.

For example, California suspended more than 400 marijuana business permits in November, which affected roughly 5 percent of the state’s legal cannabis supply chain.

Marijuana businesses from retailers to distributors were affected and had to cease all sales until their licenses were reinstated to “active” status.

Later in the month, however, industry observers said California’s licensed marijuana supply chain likely wouldn’t see huge effects from the permit suspensions, because many of the cannabis companies involved weren’t operational or were canceled business ventures.

RELATED: The 10 Biggest Cannabis Stories Of 2019

7. Legal Cannabis Gifts Lead To New Business Practice In Michigan

In January, a legal loophole in Michigan was pointed out that allowed individuals to give away cannabis free of charge. That led to a new business model by some companies in which they sold products such as non-infused candy or art and added a free bit of marijuana as a “gift.”

Some entrepreneurs might have gotten the idea from Washington DC, where recreational cannabis is legal but sales are still prohibited and where gifting popped up as a way to sidestep the sales ban.

8. California Governor To Send National Guard To Combat Illegal Marijuana Growers

California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed an order in February that redeployed 360 National Guard troops from the U.S.-Mexico border to three other state-specific assignments.

The move was welcomed by the state’s legal marijuana growers, which have long struggled against a thriving illicit market.

9. In Landmark Move, Illinois Lawmakers Approve Adult-Use Cannabis Program That Could Hit $2 Billion In Sales

Illinois made the historic move in May of becoming the first state to legalize adult-use marijuana cultivation and sales through its Legislature.

The announcement was cheered by the cannabis industry as it potentially created of one of the nation’s largest adult-use marijuana markets offering massive business opportunities.

Marijuana Business Daily estimates the Illinois recreational market could eventually hit $2.5 billion a year in sales.

10. Marijuana Wholesale Prices On The Rise In Mature Recreational Markets

As of August, wholesale cannabis prices looked to be going up in the recreational cannabis markets in Colorado, Oregon and Washington state, according to two reports and insights from growers.

The upward price trend seemed related to stronger demand and weaker supply, growers going out of business and some farmers pivoting to hemp.

To stay up to date on the latest marijuana-related news make sure to like Marijuana Business Daily on Facebook

text1: ARDE GUANAJUATO POR CHOQUE CON EL MARRO - Plaza de Armas AGENCIAS CELAYA, GTO.- Celaya fue “sitiada” la tarde de este martes por narcobloqueos que estrangularon las cuatro entradas y salidas de la ciudad. La violencia se ha recrudecido tras la captura y posterior vinculación a proceso de Rodolfo Yepez, papá de José Antonio Yepez Ortiz, alias El Marro, líder del Cartel Santa Rosa de Lima, y Fabián “N” alias La Vieja, uno de los fundadores de esta organización delictiva y allegado al cabecilla de esta célula. La violencia comenzó desde los primeros minutos de este martes con un ataque armado a una caseta de la Policía Municipal, con un saldo oficial de un policía herido. Y prosiguió alrededor de las 2:30 de la tarde con diversas acciones delictivas: 1.- Pipa incendiándose. 11.- Blvd. Adolfo López Mateos esquina Avenida Miguel Hidalgo, a la altura de la Glorieta de la PEPSI. Vehículo incendiándose. A cargo de la autoridad municipal. Comentarios Comentario
text2:
ETN Y PRIMERA PLUS CANCELAN SALIDAS A GUANAJUATO - Plaza de Armas
FERNANDO VENEGAS

Derivado del clima de inseguridad que se ha generado tras la captura y posterior vinculación a proceso de Rodolfo Yepez, papá de José Antonio Yepez Ortiz, alias El Marro, líder del Cartel Santa Rosa de Lima, y Fabián “N” alias La Vieja, uno de los fundadores de esta organización delictiva, las empresas Enlaces Terrestres Nacionales (ETN) y Primera Plus, han cancelado todas sus salidas de Querétaro a Celaya, Irapuato, Salamanca, León y Guanajuato capital. Lo anterior, hasta que se restablezca la tranquilidad en el vecino estado.

text1:
Moskova’dan büyük bir uzmanlar ekibi Ermenistan’a geliyor
Moskova’dan büyük bir uzmanlar ekibi Ermenistan’a geliyor

Ermeni ünlü doktor Vahe Ter-Minasyan Facebook sayfasında paylaşımda bulunarak Rusya’nın beşkenti Moskova’dan büyük bir uzmanlar ekibinin Ermenistan’a geleceğini duyurdu.

Yaptığı paylaşımda Ter-Minasyan “Dün akşam geç saatlerinde Moskova’nın Pavlovskaya hastanesinin Başhekimi Giorgi Melkonyan’ın çağrısına uyarak büyük sayıda Ermeni ve Rusyalı uzmanlar ekip oluşturup Ermenistan’a gelmek için gönüllü olarak kaydedildiklerini öğrendim. Ekipte koronavirüse karşı mücadelede büyük tecrübeleri olan uzmanlar yer alacak. İşte insani değerler, vatanseverlik ve arkadaşseverlik dediğimiz anlayışların göstergesidir bu. Bu değerlerle yaşamalı ve nesillere örnek olmalıyız” ifadelerine yer verdi.

Vahe Ter-Minasyan’ın paylaştığı bilgilere göre Rusya’dan gelen doktorlar birkaç gün sonra Ermenistan’ın başkenti Yerevan’da olacaklar.

-Ermenistan-koronavirüs/185635
text2:
Ermenistan Başbakanı sokağa çıkma yasağının 10 gün daha uzatıldığını açıkladı
Ermenistan Başbakanı sokağa çıkma yasağının 10 gün daha uzatıldığını açıkladı

Ermenistan Başbakanı Nikol Paşinyan Facebook sayfasından canlı yayına çıktı ve Ermenistan’da koronavirüs salgınının son durumuyla ilgili açıklamalarda bulundu.

Başbakan Paşinyan sokağa çıkma yasağının 10 gün daha uzatıldığını duyurdu. 24 Mart tarihinde alınan karara göre 31 Mart saat 23:59’da sokağa çıkma yasağı kaldırılacaktı, fakat yaşanan gelişmeler bu yasağın uzatılmasına sebep oldu.

Paşinyan riskin büyük olduğunu belirterek herkes ciddi yaklaşım göstermeye çağırdı. Başbakanın sözlerine göre Ermenistan’da kaydedilen 532 koronavirüs hastalarından 90 kişide zattüre tespit edildi ve 30 kişinin durumu kritiktir.

-Başbakanı-koronavirüs/179827

text2:
Post Malone 给自己带来新年新面孔纹身
华盛顿特区 [美国]，1 月 1 日（ANI）：Post Malone 再次将他的脸用作画布，并在其上涂上纹身以庆祝 2020 年的开始。

据福克斯新闻报道，流行现象选择了一个拿着连枷的中世纪手套来装饰他已经很严重的脸。

这位“摇滚明星”歌手的纹身艺术家与他本周二在 Instagram 上发布的一张照片分享了他的创作。

在标题中，“kylehedigertattoo”写道：“2019 年的最后一个纹身。男婴的手套@postmalone 爱你。2020 年将更上一层楼。爱你们所有人”。

马龙在新年前夜的时代广场与瑞恩·西克雷斯特（Ryan Seacrest 2020）一起在“迪克·克拉克（Dick Clark）的新年前夜摇滚夜”（Dick Clark's New Year's Rockin' Eve with Ryan Seacrest 2020）中表演，他在演出前在 Instagram 上分享了他的新纹身。

这位歌手与 K-pop 男孩乐队 BTS 以及 Sam Hunt 和 Lauren Patten 等其他艺术家分享了时代广场的舞台。 (ANI)

text1: Cómo dominarán la voz y el video en 2020 01 de enero de 2020 11:14 IST 'Lo que más me sorprende es que hoy en día los usuarios se comunican con altavoces activados por voz como si estuvieran hablando con otro ser humano, usando palabras como "por favor", y "gracias" e incluso "lo siento"!', dice el gurú de la publicidad Sandeep Goyal. Fotografía: Hitesh Harisinghani/ Rediff.com IMAGEN: Para 2020, el 50 % de todas las búsquedas en Internet se basarán en la voz. La gran tendencia que dominará la década de 2020 es el surgimiento de la voz como una fuerza potente en el mundo digital del mañana. La mayoría se sorprendería al saber que para 2020, el 50 % de todas las búsquedas en Internet se basarán en la voz. Además, para 2020, el 30% de todas las búsquedas se realizarán utilizando un dispositivo sin pantalla. En un extremo del espectro, el 40% de los adultos ahora no tiene más remedio que participar en ese viaje. En 2020, y después. Entonces, el amanecer de la nueva década será sobre las 2V que impulsarán otra V muy importante... Voz y video que impulsarán el valor del consumidor para las marcas
text2:
The financial perks of going solar – Beacon
The financial perks of going solar

By: Pat Mertz Esswein Posted on: January 01, 2020

Ivica Bilich and Jennifer Twiggs, of Charlotte, North Carolina, love their house’s solar panels.

“When I pull up to my house on a sunny day and see the panels, they look like a slot machine dropping money on my front porch,” Bilich said.

The couple had been thinking about going solar for years, but in the fall of 2018, the numbers — a combination of falling costs and incentives — finally made sense.

A local solar installer proposed a system that cost $20,000 before any incentives. The couple learned they would get a federal tax credit of $6,000 — 30% of the cost of the system — and a $4,320 rebate from Duke Energy. The incentives reduced their total cost to $9,680.

“It was a no-brainer for us,” Twiggs said.

The case for going solar

Homeowners have been installing solar panels at a record pace, taking advantage of falling prices and the federal tax credit, which is slated to be phased out by 2022.

Solar panels are getting more powerful, more efficient and cheaper every year, according to industry experts. The average household will recoup the cost of their system in just over seven years.

Consider your house’s site

If you pay a high electric rate and live in a sunny location, there’s a compelling case for going solar.

For an estimate of the cost and benefit of adding solar panels to your home, use the EnergySage Solar Calculator. It uses a combination of satellite imagery (to see your roof, its size and orientation to the sun), data you provide about your electricity bill, real-time cost data from solar firms in your area, and its own proprietary formulas.

EnergySage recently launched the EnergySage Buyer’s Guide, which allows consumers to easily search, filter and compare solar equipment (panels, inverters and solar batteries) based on quality rating, aesthetics, performance and pricing.

In most states, homeowners whose systems produce more electricity than they use can send the excess to the utility’s electric grid and receive credit on their electric bill. (To see what incentives your state offers, visit dsireusa.org.)

Ways to pay

A decade ago, a residential system cost $40,000 to $60,000, according to Vikram Aggarwal, CEO of EnergySage.com, and solar financing wasn’t available. Today, with the cost of a typical system running $18,300 before the tax credit and incentives, two-thirds of homeowners have purchased their systems outright.

Buying your system will maximize the financial benefit, but third-party ownership [where the installer owns the panels and you pay them monthly for using them or for the energy they generate] can still reduce your electric bills. With third-party ownership, the solar firm benefits directly from the tax credit, not you — though it may pass along a lower cost to you.

If you don’t own your panels, you’ll see 15% to 30% lower utility bills, Aggarwal said. But if you pay for a system with cash, you’ll enjoy 100% of the savings — after you recoup the cost of the system.

If you want to finance your system, tapping a home-equity line of credit is a good way to do it. The debt is deductible because it’s secured by your home and the panels are a substantial home improvement.

In 2020, the tax credit drops from 30% down to 26%; in 2021, it falls to 22%. After that, it disappears.

© 2019 The Kiplinger Washington Editors, Inc. Distributed by Tribune Content Agency, LLC.

text1: Crown Princess Mary is the epitome of elegance in a white gown at a Copenhagen castle We love it when celebrities and royals repeat their favourite outfits, and Crown Princess Mary of Denmark has done that not once but twice over the past few days. Looking as though she had just stepped straight out of a fairytale, the royal joined her husband Crown Prince Frederik, 51, and her mother-in-law Queen Margrethe II on Thursday for a New Year's diplomatic reception in Copenhagen wearing the most beautiful white gown. She looked right at home in Christiansborg Castle! With a straight neckline and long sleeves, the 47-year-old opted for understated glamour in the floor-length dress, a pair of pearl drop earrings and a matching pearl necklace. She added splashes of colour with a soft purple belt and heels and protected herself to use with it. Same ruby red silk velvet bought from the start, as we knew it would be reusable for future gala occasions in a new classic design." MORE: Best royal fashion moments from 2019 - Kate Middleton, Meghan Markle & mor
text2: Crown Princess Mary of Denmark stuns as the Danish royal family host their New Year reception Advertisement The women of the Danish royal family put on a dazzling display as they arrived in Copenhagen for their annual new year's celebration tonight. Crown Princess Mary, 47, led with the glamour in a velvet burgundy gown adorned with diamonds and rubies as she attended her family's traditional New Year reception at Amalienborg Palace in her country's capital. She joined her sister-in-law Princess Marie, 43, her aunt-in-law Princess Benedikte, 75, and her mother-in-law Queen Margrethe II, 79, in celebrating the new year. The women put on a jaw-dropping display, kitted out in eye-catching diamond tiaras, ruby and pearl necklaces and emerald jewels. Mary's velvet gown, mascara and eyeshadow which put the emphasis on her deep sea blue eyes Queen Margrethe II (left) beamed in aquamarine as she was joined by her younger sister Benedikte, in purple, (right) for the festivitie

text1: 弗里德曼：油人队对交易选秀权持谨慎态度 Ken Holland 在他执掌埃德蒙顿油人队的第一个赛季中途发现自己处于一个棘手的境地。他的总体计划是通过草案重组组织。这里有 Connor McDavid、Leon Draisaitl、Oscar Klefbom 和其他人的核心，以及未成年人的良好前景。但是还有很长的路要走，而增加人才最谨慎的方法是通过起草和发展。但也有一支球队和一个球迷群渴望季后赛曲棍球。有一栋建筑每晚都不会售罄，因为球迷们不想花高价看到一支没有获胜的球队。麦克戴维和德莱赛特尔这两位超级巨星也在竭尽全力拖着这支球队，可以理解为什么荷兰现阶段不想交易选秀权，但希望他能找到某种中间立场，因为站在拍拍并让 McDavid 和 Draisaitl 无所事事，这并不理想
text2: Jwala Gutta，Vishnu Vishal 迎来新的一年，希望有可爱照片的粉丝们 Kollywood 演员 Vishnu Vishal 和羽毛球明星 Jwala Gutta 已经约会了一段时间，并一直在他们的社交媒体上分享他们的照片。随着世界迎来2020年新的一年，两人再次在推特上分享了几张他们在新年前夜在一起的照片。虽然第一张照片是他们祝粉丝们新年快乐，但第二张照片更像是一张亲密的照片，标题是“我的宝贝”。第三张照片让他们分享了一个舒适的时刻。在专业方面，Gutta 早些时候推出了 Jwala Gutta Academy of Excellence——一个最先进的运动场馆，将为各种比赛提供训练设施，包括板球、羽毛球和游泳。 “印度是一个巨大的国家，我们只有 Saina 和 Sindhu，所以我相信我们需要她在 12 月创办学院时说过。与此同时，Vishal 最后一次出现在 2018 年动作喜剧电影 Silukkuvarupatti Singam 中。他有两部电影排队——Jagajaala Killadi 和 FIR

text1: У Great Atlantic Resources Corp. (CVE:GR) особенно нестабильная цена акций? Если вы владеете акциями Great Atlantic Resources Corp. (CVE:GR), то стоит подумать о том, как они влияют на волатильность вашего портфеля в целом. В финансах Бета является мерой волатильности. Современная финансовая теория рассматривает волатильность как меру риска, и существует два основных типа волатильности цен. Первый тип — волатильность, характерная для компании. Инвесторы используют диверсификацию между некоррелированными акциями, чтобы уменьшить такую волатильность цен в портфеле. Второй тип — это более широкая рыночная волатильность, которую вы не можете диверсифицировать, поскольку она возникает из-за макроэкономических факторов, которые напрямую влияют на все акции на рынке. Некоторые акции более чувствительны к общим рыночным силам, чем другие. Бета-версия может быть полезным инструментом для понимания того, насколько на акции влияет отсутствие позиции на рынке по упомянутым акциям. Мы стремимся предоставить вам долгосрочный целенаправленный исследовательский анализ, основанный на фундаментальных данных. Обратите внимание, что наш анализ может не учитывать последние объявления компаний, чувствительные к ценам, или качественные материалы. Спасибо за чтение
text2: Руководство и управление организационными изменениями | The Guardian Nigeria News - Нигерия и мировые новости Каждое изменение начинается с решения руководства. Принять решение о введении изменений не всегда легко. Быть подготовленным, хорошо планировать и быть в окружении хорошей команды значительно облегчит принятие решения. Начните с того, что настройте себя на позитивный лад. Вы, вероятно, испытаете более высокий, чем обычно, уровень стресса, и знание этого заранее даст вам возможность быть готовым умственно и физически. Вы будете опорой и опорой, и твердой рукой будете вести свою команду через напряженные события. Будьте обнадеживающей и активной силой на протяжении всего процесса. Невозможно подготовиться ко всем непредвиденным обстоятельствам, но планирование на известное необходимо. Добавьте время или дополнительную комнату в расписание для неизвестных. Когда вы сталкиваетесь с непредвиденным событием, ваш график не должен сильно откладываться, если вы считаете, что эти типы празднования пытаются каким-то образом включить участие основного спонсора изменений. Профессор Акиндотун Меринос

text1: Söder: Bund und Länder tragen Corona-Regeln gemeinsam Markus Söder mit Maske - Markus Söder, Ministerpräsident von Bayern, trägt eine Gesichtsmaske mit dem weiß-blauen Rautenmuster Bayerns. - © Foto: Markus Schreiber/AP-Pool/dpa Nach viel Streit sieht Bayerns Ministerpräsident Markus Söder (CSU) Bund und Länder im Kampf gegen die Corona-Krise nun auf einem gemeinsamen, guten Kurs. Die Grundregeln und die Grundphilosophie würden von allen mitgetragen, sagte Söder am Mittwoch nach einer Konferenz der Ministerpräsidenten mit Kanzlerin Angela Merkel (CDU) in Berlin. Er sprach von einem guten, gemeinschaftlichen Ergebnis. Die Konferenz sei auch von der Stimmung her konzentrierter und harmonischer gewesen als die vergangenen. Söder betonte aber auch, Bund und Länder hätten in den vergangenen Monaten die richtigen Weichenstellungen im Kampf gegen das Coronavirus getroffen und damit wohl Zehntausende Masken seien ganz entscheidend. Bund und Länder hatten sich bei dem Treffen nach langem Streit im Umgang mit der Corona-Krise auf ein gemeinsames Vorgehen an den Schulen, in Sachen Maskenpflicht, Abstandsregeln und Großveranstaltungen verständigt
text2:
BERLIN – Merkel says ‘Nein’ to cabinet reshuffle
In response to a suggestion to “rejuvenate and renew” the government made on Monday (6 January) by the head of the Christian Social Union (CSU) and Minister-President of Bavaria, Markus Söder, Chancellor Angela Merkel has declined to reshuffle her cabinet.

Although the idea of bringing in ‘new blood’, particularly with the intent to replace the ministers in charge of the economy, Peter Altmaier, and science and innovation, Anja Karliczek, appeared to gain traction after it had been backed by the leader of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU), it has quickly fallen flat.

With the Chancellor’s formal rejection, there is no chance for this proposal to go any further.

(Sarah Lawton | EURACTIV.de)

text1: 21 restaurantes y bares de Tucson que cerraron en 2019 Si bien 2019 fue un año fuerte para las aperturas, como siempre, hubo varios cierres. Si bien se abrieron docenas de nuevos bares y restaurantes en Tucson durante 2019, alrededor de 21 restaurantes cerraron. Sucede por una multitud de razones. Aquí está la lista de restaurantes que cerraron en 2019; si nos perdimos alguno, por favor háganoslo saber. Alafia Cocina de África Occidental 1070 N. Swan Rd. Alafia West African Cuisine anunció en noviembre que cerró indefinidamente después de cuatro años en el negocio. El 4 de diciembre nos dijeron: Estamos trabajando duro para posiblemente reabrir con nueva administración. Lea nuestro artículo de diciembre de 2019 Alafia West African Cuisine cerró, buscando un nuevo propietario. Besties pescado y hamburguesa 14 W. Grant Rd. El local de hamburguesas al vapor y pescado frito Besties cerró en junio. Sin embargo, es posible que lo encuentre ocasionalmente regresando como un Dark Cafe 121 E. Broadway Blvd. El café 24/7 Shot in the Dark cerró su ubicación en el centro en enero. Aún no se ha anunciado ninguna ubicación de reemplazo. Lea nuestro artículo de enero de 2019 Shot in the Dark Cafe para cerrar el centro, nueva ubicación tentativa

text1: Blessed for Broad Street at the Mummers Mass Hours before donning their costumes, Mummers from a number of clubs were blessed for their New Year’s Day strut down Broad Street. Some 400 Mummers and their supporters gathered for the 31st annual Mummers Mass on Dec. 31 at Our Lady of Mount Carmel Parish in South Philadelphia. The liturgy celebrated the neighborhood’s commitment to the Mummers tradition, while marking the vigil of the Solemnity of Mary, the Mother of God. “Jesus believed in fun,” said pastor and celebrant Father Francis Cauterrucci, who delivered his homily while wearing a sequined eye mask. “We gather in joyful celebration because we believe in one another.” According to various estimates, some 10,000 participants typically perform in the Philadelphia parade, which ranks as the nation’s oldest of its kind. The event his homily. “We celebrate the great and particular gifts given to us by God,” he said. “Celebrate the parade, celebrate the people who are in the parade, and celebrate this gift of life that we share together in the church.
text2: Mummers Parade 2020: How to Watch, Live Stream Philadelphia's New Year's Tradition While some will likely spend Wednesday recovering from their New Year's Eve celebrations, many in Philadelphia will watch the Mummers Parade, a tradition unique to the City of Brotherly Love. As mummery in the United States is largely unknown outside of the Philadelphia area, the first question some people might ask is "What is a mummer?" Honoring a tradition whose roots trace back to America in the 1600s, mummers dress up in fanciful costumes and celebrate the New Year with an annual parade on January 1. More than 10,000 men, women and children participate in the nearly 120-year-old celebration, according to the city's Independence Visitor Center. The parade begins at 9 a.m. EST at City Hall and continues south on Broad Street until it hits Washington Avenue. It's expectedncies, we're all mummers and we're all in together and we're all brothers and sisters, and that's what this parade has always been about—traditions," Golden Crown's Bill Burke Jr. told WPVI

text1:
Abfälle wurden im Mai teurer – Mineralöl- und chemische Produkte günstiger
(sat) Der Gesamtindex der Produzenten- und Importpreise ist im Mai gegenüber dem Vormonat um 0,5 Prozent gesunken und erreichte den neuen Stand von 97,6 Punkten (Dezember 2015 = 100). Im Vergleich zum Mai 2019 ist das Preisniveau des Gesamtangebots von Inland- und Importprodukten sogar um 4,5 Prozent zurückgegangen. Dies teilt das Bundesamt für Statistik (BFS) am Montag mit.

Wie das BFS schreibt, ist der aktuelle Rückgang des Produzentenpreisindexes im Mai vor allem auf tiefere Preise für pharmazeutische und chemische Produkte sowie Mineralölprodukte zurückzuführen. Steigende Preise gibt es laut BFS bei der Sammlung von Abfällen und deren Rückgewinnung. Beim Importpreisindex sind die Preise im Mai insbesondere für Mineralöl- und chemische Produkte sowie Erdöl und Erdgas gesunken.
text2:
Fire Service suspends tours
The Barbados Fire Service has suspended tours to the stations as part of its coronavirus protocols. (FILE)

The Barbados Fire Service (BFS) will suspend all station tours from Tuesday, March 17, until further notice. In addition, all non-essential visits to fire stations, outside of legitimate business transactions, are discouraged and people are asked to contact the BFS at 535-7800 to have their queries addressed.

This forms part of the BFS’ contingency plan to maintain public health and safety during the current COVID-19 pandemic. The management of the BFS thanks the public for its cooperation.

(BGIS)

text2: 出于安全考虑，海地领导人纪念独立日 太子港，海地——在经历了数月的政治动荡之后，海地总统 Jovenel Moïse 周三打破传统，出于安全原因在首都庆祝了该国的独立日。莫伊斯的政府被指控腐败，他在太子港国家宫发表演讲时谴责贪污腐败，并敦促海地精英与政府合作，帮助创造就业机会。 “我们仍然非常贫穷，”他说。 “那些继续致富的人发现他们不纳税是正常的，没有竞争是正常的，他们为消费者定价是正常的，尤其是当这个消费者就是国家本身时。” Moïse 还为该国持续的停电表示歉意，并重新参加了 2016 年的竞选活动，他参加了一名反政府抗议者的葬礼，然后随着更多抗议者的加入，抬着他的棺材穿过街道。版权所有 2020 美联社。版权所有。本材料不得出版、广播、重写或重新分发

text1: Ya puedes consultar con tus médicos a través de llamadas telefónicas o videollamadas Ya puedes consultar con tus médicos a través de llamadas telefónicas o videollamadas. El gobierno ha publicado las tan esperadas pautas que permiten a los profesionales médicos registrados (RMP) ofrecer consultas, asesoramiento, educación médica y tratamiento desde ubicaciones remotas mediante el uso de la tecnología. En India, hasta ahora no había legislación ni directrices sobre la práctica de la telemedicina, a través de video, teléfono, plataformas basadas en Internet (web/chat/aplicaciones, etc.). Además de brindar un acceso oportuno y más rápido, la telemedicina también reducirá los costos financieros asociados con los viajes. También reduce las molestias/impacto para la familia y los cuidadores y puede reducir la carga sobre los hospitales secundarios. Las pautas también asumen importancia en el contexto de la actual pandemia de coronavirus. “Se puede realizar una visita de telemedicina sin exponer al personal a virus/infecciones u otros incentivos. La consulta de telemedicina no debe ser anónima; tanto el paciente como el RMP deben conocer la identidad del otro. El RMP tiene que mantener obligatoriamente bitácora o registro de la interacción de telemedicina, y también registros de pacientes, informes, documentos
text2:
Never waste a crisis
India is doing a commendable job in fighting the Covid-19 pandemic. It took the epidemic seriously unlike some other countries when it emerged on the global horizon and has generally been ahead of the curve. Whether it’s screening of international passengers, quarantine or announcing lockdown, the central government has never been found wavering or hesitant.

The first priority obviously is to save people from this virus. The lockdown was announced when the cases were still very few. It reduced the speed of the spread of the virus and gave the government time to set up the ...

text1: Interview | Trent Alexander-Arnold on technique, assists and Wolves clash For Trent Alexander-Arnold, assisting a goal is just as satisfying as the act of putting the ball in the back of the net. It's a special feeling the 21-year-old full-back has experienced frequently over the past 16 months. Since the start of last season, no player in the Premier League has racked up more assists than the England international's 20 in the competition. A Man of the Match performance away to Leicester City on Boxing Day saw Alexander-Arnold add to that tally, with the Academy graduate also on the scoresheet in the 4-0 victory. Read on below as Liverpoolfc.com sat down with the No.66 to review his spectacular display against the Foxes and look ahead to the upcoming encounter with Wolverhampton Wanderers at Anfield on Sunday. Trent,m thankful for everyone that's helped me along the way, always been there for me, pushed me to work so hard and always been in my corner. I can only say thank you to the people that have helped and here's to hopefully another good decade
text2: Government flu shots continue By Lee I-chia / Staff reporter The third phase of government-funded flu vaccinations started yesterday, the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) said, urging pregnant women, government health workers and others who are eligible for the free vaccinations to get their shots before the Lunar New Year holiday. The final round of free vaccinations is available for adults aged 50 to 64; pregnant women and parents of infants younger than six months old; caretakers at long-term care centers and nursing homes; workers at health departments and disease prevention agencies; childcare facility and nursery employees; and poultry, livestock and animal disease prevention workers, the CDC said. People with rare diseases, catastrophic illness, high-risk chronic diseases or a body mass index of 30 and more, are also eligible, it added. The government-funded quadrivalent vaccine, provided in of Sunday, about 3.38 million government-funded vaccines have been administered, with about 1.24 million vaccines unused, and the last batch of about 1.42 million vaccines would be dispatched to local healthcare facilities today, he added

text1: La recensione di Providence Lost di Paul Lay - l'ascesa e la caduta del protettorato di Oliver Cromwell L'unica esecuzione pubblica di un capo di stato britannico avvenne 371 anni fa fuori dalla Banqueting House di Whitehall il 30 gennaio 1649. Fu un atto radicale e non intenzionale, nato da negoziati falliti e ha completamente ignorato il popolo di Scozia e Irlanda. I dettagli sopravvissuti sono piccanti e vergognosi: Carlo I in due camicie per non tradire la paura rabbrividita in una giornata fredda, un carnefice mascherato con parrucca e barba finta, un gemito collettivo della folla. Questo era il momento in cui calava il sipario. Dopo un intervallo, o interregno, in cui Oliver Cromwell assunse il potere e uccise ogni gioia, gli Stuart tornarono per il secondo atto, Carlo II: l'allegro monarca. His rnce Lost: The Rise and Fall of Oliver Cromwell's Protectorate è pubblicato da Head of Zeus (RRP £ 30). Per ordinarne una copia vai su guardianbookshop.com. Spese di spedizione gratuite nel Regno Unito superiori a £ 15
text2: I 50 anni di The Irish Post sono qualcosa da celebrare QUANDO ero un bambino, crescendo a Birmingham, avevamo tre giornali regolari in casa. The Daily Mirror, The Observer e The Irish Post. The Mirror a quei tempi aveva artisti del calibro di Paul Foot e John Pilger che scrivevano per questo. Erano i giorni prima che ogni tabloid diventasse puramente un'estensione dell'industria dell'intrattenimento. L'Observer, che ho ancora oggi, ha portato un'approfondita copertura di notizie internazionali nelle strade del nostro centro cittadino. E The Irish Post era il nostro giornale che parlava di noi. Pubblicità Penso che The Irish Post debba essere stato fondamentale nel senso di identità di molte generazioni di seconda e terza, perché qui c'era un giornale che parlava proprio di quella vita. Sedersi in una casa in Inghilterra, appartenente a una famiglia irlandese, a leggere The Irish Post, era una parte naturale della nostra vita come Coronation Street in televisione e il Sacro Cuore in quella nota. Ma qui c'è ancora The Irish Post. So che è gennaio, ma per questo vale la pena alzare un bicchiere, no? Quindi, per tutti gli irlandesi e per tutti un amico degli irlandesi. E anche tutti gli altri. Buon anno

text1:
Koronawirus w Belgii: 1629 nowych przypadków koronawirusa [DANE Z 12 KWIETNIA]
Od ogłoszenia poprzedniego raportu dzień wcześniej do szpitali przyjęto 392 pacjentów, a 477 osób mogło zostać wypisanych. W sumie w Belgii hospitalizowanych z powodu Covid-19 jest 5353 osób - o 282 mniej niż w sobotę. Całkowita liczba potwierdzonych przypadków wynosi 29 647.

1223 pacjentów jest obecnie na oddziale intensywnej terapii - o 39 mniej niż w sobotę.

"Le Soir" wskazuje, że liczba hospitalizacji i osób leczonych na intensywnej terapii stabilizuje się i prawdopodobnie szczyt epidemii został osiągnięty. Wskazuje jednak, że liczba zgonów nadal rośnie bardzo szybko. W ciągu ostatnich 24 godzin zgłoszono 268 dodatkowych zgonów, w efekcie czego łączna liczba ofiar śmiertelnych wzrosła do ponad 3600.

Cytowany przez publicznego nadawcę wirusolog Steven Van Gucht uważa, że Belgia mogła przejść już przez szczyt zakażeń. "Możliwe, że minęliśmy szczyt epidemii, ale wskaźniki śmiertelności są nadal wysokie. Trzeba też rozróżniać szpitale i domy opieki. W szpitalach wskaźniki śmiertelności utrzymują się na stałym poziomie od dwóch tygodni. W domach opieki obserwujemy stały wzrost od początku kwietnia" - powiedział w sobotę.
text2: Belgium: Over 1,000 new cases of coronavirus infection per day 1,063 new cases of coronavirus infection, 927 patients in intensive care units, total number of infections over 11,000 and over 500 deaths - this is the latest balance of the coronavirus epidemic in Belgium. The data was released on Monday by the Covid-19 crisis center. According to the data of the center, 82 people have died due to the coronavirus in the past 24 hours. 1063 tests were positive, bringing the total number of infected people in Belgium to 11,899. Previously, several hundred new infections were found every day, but for several days there have been over 1,000. The reason for the higher number of infected is not only the spread of the virus, but also the increased testing capacity. over the age of 65, but a "significant proportion" of deaths occur in patients aged 45 to 64 years. Several deaths were also recorded in the 25-44 age category. From Brussels, Łukasz Osińsk

text1: Paddy Reynolds, former Irish Press northern editor, died peacefully in north Belfast home The Irish Press founder Éamon de Valera said the paper's objective was `To give the truth in the news' PADDY (Pat) Reynolds, who rose to become Irish Press northern editor during his eventful and distinguished journalism career, has died at his north Belfast home. Mr Reynolds died "peacefully" on Saturday at the house on Upper Cavehill Road "surrounded by his loving family". He had recounted details of his five-decade long career as a journalist - which included a stint working for the Daily Mail, in in entertaining 2004 book `The Late Paddy Murphy: Memoirs of an Irish Journalist'. Starting as a boy growing up in the Cregagh area of east Belfast, the memoir spanned his early. Therese of Lisieux Church on Somerton Road, with daughters Anne, Pauline, Joanie and Colette asking for donations in lieu of funeral flowers to Dementia NI. Burial afterwards will be in Carnmoney Cemeter
text2: Return to form 'just round the corner' insists Joe Root Joe Root believes he is "not far away" from recovering his best form with the bat. The England captain has slipped outside the top 10 of the ICC's Test batting rankings - with 697 rankings points, it's his lowest ranking for more than five years - and admits he "played two horrendous shots" in the first Test against New Zealand in Mount Maunganui. But he says his batting has "just clicked" in training and feels a return to form is "round the corner." "I'm not far away," Root said as he came out of the nets in Hamilton on Wednesday. "I'm feeling really good in practice. I know I played two horrendous shots in the last game but, in many ways, the fact that I'm getting myself out and not being got out, means. That's what matters. I'd take a pair for a win. But we're more likely to win if I score a double-hundred." England have an optional training session on Thursday afternoon in Hamilton; the second Test starts on Friday

Meteorolojiden İstanbul için kritik uyarı: Hızı 110 km'yi bulacak!
Yapılan açıklama şöyle...

"Pazar gününden itibaren Güney Ege üzerinde oluşacak derin alçak basınç merkezi ile birlikte yeni bir yağışlı sistemin etkisine gireceği tahmin ediliyor. Pazar günü Marmara, Ege ve Batı Akdeniz'de başlayacak yağışların, Pazartesi ve Salı günleri Doğu Karadeniz kıyıları ile Doğu Anadolu'nun doğusu dışında ülke genelinde etkili olacağı tahmin ediliyor. Yağışların kıyı kesimlerde yağmur ve sağanak, iç kesimlerde ise karla karışlık yağmur ve yer yer kar şeklinde olması bekleniyor.

06 Ocak Pazartesi ve Salı günü beklenen yağışların, Marmara, Kuzey Ege kıyıları ve Akdeniz bölgesi ile İç Anadolu'nun güney kesimlerinde kuvvetli (21-50 kg/metrekare), Antalya'nın doğusu, Mersin ve Adana'da şiddetli ve yer yer aşırı (metrekareye 100 kg ve üzeri yağış) olacağı tahmin ediliyor. Rüzgarın; Pazartesi ve Salı günü Marmara bölgesi ile kuzey Ege kıyılarında kuzeydoğu yönünden (poyraz) şiddetli ve yer yer tam fırtına şeklinde (80-110 km/saat) esmesi bekleniyor."
text2: İstanbul'a kar yağacak mı? İstanbul'a kar ne zaman yağacak? İstanbul hava durumu.. İstanbul'a kar ne zaman yağacak? sorusu tüm İstanbullular tarafından arama motorunda yoğun olarak aranıyor. text1: 63 yıllık efsane itfaiye aracı her an göreve hazır 63 yıllık efsane itfaiye aracı her an göreve hazır TOKAT'ın Zile ilçesinde, 63 yıllık olan itfaiye aracı halen faal olarak kullanılıyor. TOKAT'ın Zile ilçesinde, 63 yıllık olan itfaiye aracı halen faal olarak kullanılıyor. Türkiye'de ender bulunan Alman yapımı araç, vatandaşların da ilgisini çekiyor. Zile Belediyesi itfaiyesi bünyesinde 50 yıldır hizmet veren Ford marka araç, Almanya'da 1957 yılında üretildi. Daha önce Ankara'da görev yapan araç 1970 yılında Zile Belediyesi'nce satın alındı. 50 yıldır Zile'deki yangınlara müdahale edilen araç, 6 silindirli 5 bin motoruyla aradan yıllar geçmesine rağmen orijinal özelliklerini korumaya devam ediyor. Motorunun ürettiği sıcaklıkla taşıdığı suyun kış şartlarında donmasını önleyen özel bir sisteme sahip olan itfaiye aracı, seyyar aydınlatma sistemi ile 8 ile 10 bar edip buluyorduk. 6 koldan su veren bir araç. 2 kişi olmadan hortumunu tutamıyorduk. Yıkılması gereken ahşap yeri yıkabiliyorduk. Su basıncı o kadar güçlü. Halen aracımızdan memnunuz" diye konuştu. Kaynak: DH
text2: İşçiler kaygılı: Hastalıkta da sağlıkta da bizi en son düşünüyorlar Ebru YİĞİT Kocaeli Dünyada salgının, Türkiye’de vaka sayılarının arttığı koronavirüse ilişkin kalabalık ortamlardan uzak durma uyarısı yapılsa da her bir fabrikada binlerce işçi dip dibe saatler geçiriyor. Bir yandan alınan önlemlerin yetersiz olması işçileri kaygılandırırken diğer taraftan okulların tatil edilmesiyle işçiler çocuklarını evde yalnız bırakmanın kaygısını taşıyor. Bir işçi, “Virüs bizi ya da sevdiklerimizi öldürmezse bile ya izin alamadığımız için evdeki çocuklarımızı düşünmekten ya da izin verirlerse yaz sıcağında bir nefes alamadan çalışmaktan helak edecek” diyor. Howon fabrikasında çalışan Ahmet “Bizde önlemlerin tam alındığını söyleyemeyiz. Ellerinde termal kamera olduğunu söyledikleri bir şeyle servisten inen işçileri kontrol ettiler. Bilgilendirmek için kağıtlar astılar ama ne de hastalıkta da sağlıkta da en son düşünülen biz işçiler oluyoruz” diyor. text1: Corona-News Im Überblick: Das waren die wichtigsten Entwicklungen am Dienstag  Im Nordwesten sind neue Nachrichten für die Verbreitung des Coronavirus erreichbar. Es ist nicht so einfach, den Überblick zu verfolgen. Damit Sie, liebe Leser, in dem Zustand der Dinge bleiben, fassen unsere Redakteure jetzt jede Nacht die wichtigsten Nachrichten ab dem Tag zusammen. Die wichtigsten Nachrichten rund um den Coronavirus vom Dienstag: • Die Olympischen Spiele in Tokio Die Corona-Pandemie zog in das Jahr 2021 ein. Der internationale Olympische Komitee und die japanischen Gastgeber stimmten am Dienstag zu, wie das IOC angekündigt hatte. Der Japan-Premierminister Shinzo Abe war mit dem Vorschlag des IOC "einhundert Prozent" vereinbart worden, sagte der IOC-Präsident Thomas Bach nach einer Telefonkonferenz mit ABE und anderen Führern der Tokyo Games.LiveBlog an den Coronavirus Football Bundesliga sollte sich erstrecken Ende April • Di Krise rund 80.000 Beschäftigte in Deutschland in Kurzarbeit gehen. Dies verlautete am Dienstag aus Konzernkreisen. Das Unternehmen hat die deutschen und europäischen Werke sowie weitere Standorte in Amerika und Russland derzeit vorübergehend geschlossen oder die Anlage stirbt in Kürze
text2: Is Covid-19 Not A Good Enough Reason To Postpone The Tokyo Olympics? The very spectre of coronavirus appears to have no infectious effect on the Olympics Games, which are supposed to take place in Tokyo in July this year. The Olympic flame-lighting ceremony was successfully solemnised in a traditional fashion at its inception place in Greece. It will soon reach Japan where the start of four months-long relays will take place. This developed East Asian-Pacific nation first held the Olympics in the year 1964. It hosted the Winter Olympics at Sapporo in the year 1972, and subsequently in the year 1998, hosted the Nagano Winter Olympics. The flame lighting ceremony has shown the world that even Uncle Sam’s (aka the US’) indication to postpone the global exhibition of the long-period sporting event has no effect and would surely be organisedke out, that the Olympics had not taken place, Further, in the year 1944, the London Olympics were suspended. It was the year 1980 when the US boycotted the games, which were later boycotted by Russia in the year of 1984

text1: SDRPY schafft Arbeitsplätze für 300 Fischer aus Sokotra  Das Saudi-Entwicklungs- und Rekonstruktionsprogramm für Yemensdrpie schafft Arbeitsplätze für 300 Fischer aus Sokotrasokotra, Jemen (OTS / PRNEWSWIRE) 2. Teillieferung moderner Fischerboote. Im Zusammenhang mit dem Ausführen eines Projekts für die Bereitstellung von 100 Booten für Fischer, die von Hurricanes und tropischen Bedingungen betroffen sind, bietet Saudi-Entwicklungs- und Wiederaufbauprogramm für Jemen (SDRy) die zweite teilweise Lieferung von Fischerbooten mit modernen Booten in der Governance des Socotra-Archipels. Von dieser Lieferung an die Erholung des Fischereisektors, der Verbesserung des Einkommens von Familien, der Förderung der Selbstversorgung zur Erzielung einer nachhaltigen Lebensmittelproduktion und der steigenden Produktivität, 300 Fischer werden direkt profitieren. Darüber hinaus wird sie ein nachhaltiges wirtschaftlic e und Meeresressourcen im Sinne nachhaltiger Entwicklung erhalten und nachhaltig nutzen." Foto - Foto - Pressekontakt: media@SDRPY.gov.sa Original-Content von: The Saudi Development and Reconstruction Program for Yemen, übermittelt durch news aktuell
text2: Torrential rain kills 5 children in Yemen Torrential rain kills 5 children in Yemen Hadhramaut province affected by torrential rains Mubarak Mohamed | 03.06.2020 Torrential rain kills 5 children in Yemen SANAA Five children were killed in torrential rain in Yemen's eastern Hadhramaut province, an official told Anadolu Agency. The children from one family were killed in the Henin region as they were swept away by torrential rain, according to Abdul Latif Al-Naqeeb, a government official in al-Qatn district. A number of homes collapsed in the Hajr Directorate and major roads in the province were damaged, local sources told Anadolu Agency. The Yemeni National Center of Meteorology expects heavy rains and thunderstorms to continue in of Mahra, Hadhramaut and Shabwah provinces, with a chance of reaching Abyan, Lahij and Aden. And in said four people were killed and three others were injured in a traffic accident on a mountain road in Ghayl Ba Wazir directorate. The accident was caused by low visibility because of dense fog and heavy rain. *Writing by Mahmoud Baraka

text1: Pierde control de volante y se estrella contra base del semáforo Córdoba. Ver.- Una mujer resultó con golpes en el cuerpo, luego de chocar su automóvil contra la base de un semáforo en el distribuidor vial Diamante, al perder el control del volante. Paramédicos de Cruz Roja le dieron los primeros auxilios, y la canalizaron un hospital para una mejor valoración. Fotos: Fernando Coria | El Sol de Córdoba Policiaca Choca y vuelca taxi en centro de Córdoba El accidente ocurrió cuando la conductora manejaba el automóvil Honda City gris, de modelo reciente, proveniente de la autopista Puebla- Veracruz. En el ramal que comunica de la autopista al distribuidor la mujer perdió el control del volante debido a que al parecer no disminuyó la velocidad, por lo cual subió la jardinera y terminó incrustado el vehículo Sol de Córdoba Posteriormente y con el apoyo de trabajadores de una grúa, el vehículo fue retirado del lugar y trasladado el corralón, en donde quedaría detenido hasta que la conductora finiquite los daños provocados por el choque
text2:
2020: a la 1.07 nació la primera cordobesita del año
A la 1.07 del 1° de enero de 2020 nació la primera niña del año en la ciudad de Córdoba, en el Hospital Materno Neonatal.

Daniela Rodríguez, la mamá de 20 años, había ingresado al hospital a las 14 del 31 de diciembre, pero su trabajo de parto se extendió hasta la primera hora del 1° de enero

Ignacio Cabrera, director del centro de salud, contó a Cadena 3 que la madre ingresó al centro de salud a las 14 con la bolsa rota y que tuvo un parto normal.

"Ambas están internadas en buen estado. La pequeña pesa 3,200 kilogramos. El siguiente fue a las 1.20 y hubo varios continuados", precisó el profesional.

text1:
Efekt Trzaskowskiego. Poparcie dla Dudy spada [SONDAŻ PREZYDENCKI]
Wybory prezydenckie 2020

Reklama

Jak pokazuje najnowszy sondaż, gdyby wybory odbyły się w najbliższą niedzielę, wygrałby je obecny prezydent Andrzej Duda. Na głowę państwa zagłosowałoby 38,94 proc. badanych. Rafał Trzaskowski zajął drugie miejsce. Na prezydenta Warszawy oddałoby głos 26,60 proc. badanych.

"Super Express” przypomina, że Trzaskowski w poprzednim sondażu cieszył się poparciem 16,54 proc. Polaków. Jego poparcie wzrosło o 10 punktów procentowych. Na Andrzeja Dudę, w poprzednim badaniu, miało zagłosować 43,76 proc. wyborców, jest to spadek o prawie 5 proc.

W zmianie sondażowej widać wyraźnie "efekt Trzaskowskiego". Kandydat KO wdarł się przebojem do wyścigu prezydenckiego deklasując pozostałych kandydatów opozycji – mówił dla "SE” politolog z UKSW dr Bartosz Rydliński.

Szymon Hołownia uzyskał 16,41 proc. głosów, daleko za nim znalazł się Krzysztof Bosak z wynikiem 5,71 proc. poparcia. Na piątej pozycji uplasował się Władysław Kosiniak-Kamysz, na którego oddało by 5,46 proc. respondentów. Ostatnią pozycję zajął Robert Biedroń z 5,14 proc. poparcia.

1,74 proc. badanych chciałoby oddać głos na innego kandydata.

Badanie zrealizowane przez Instytut Badań Pollster w dniach 26-27.05.2020 r. na próbie 1038 dorosłych Polaków.
text2: Bagpipes in serious trouble. Trzaskowski's sensational result will seriously worry the president [SONDAŻ] The new SE.pl presidential poll shows that the second round of the fight for the Governor's Palace will be played between Andrzej Duda and Rafał Trzaskowski. This is a confirmation of a trend that has been visible for some time. The race continues, Duda is weakening. According to a poll for "SE" a little over a week ago, Trzaskowski has the support of 16.54 percent. Poles. Now it is supported by 26.6 percent, or 10 percent. more voters. Andrzej Duda lost for it. Earlier, 43.76 percent wanted to vote for him. subjects. Now only 38.94 percent. From among the remaining candidates, only Szymon Hołowpl can boast a double-digit result. Are you reading us? text1: 本地综合格斗选手在米勒斯堡职业生涯首次亮相 MILLERSBURG — 卢卡斯·马斯特 (Lucas Mast) 正在寻找一种好的锻炼方式。他在综合格斗中发现了这一点。 Mast 是柏林的一名理发师，他将于 1 月 11 日在米勒斯堡的 Harvest Ridge 活动中心参加荣誉格斗锦标赛 11 场比赛，参加他的职业 MMA 格斗比赛。 “我一直想摔跤，但我从来没有机会，”2014 年毕业于 Hiland 的马斯特说，他在那里为老鹰队打篮球。 “当我在柏林开始这家理发店时，我的（最终）教练停止了找工作。我一直在寻找可以让我得到很好锻炼的东西，一旦我进入 MMA，我意识到我真的很喜欢它. 一旦我开始战斗，我就意识到自己非常好。我继续前进并爱上了这项运动。”他在 8880 州 39 号公路的活动中心执教，下午 5:30 开始。 Ring of Honor 座位是 80 美元。荣誉圈是 60 美元。普通门票30美元。要订购门票，请访问网站：

text1: In Syrien wurden am vergangenen Tag keine Verstöße gegen den Waffenstillstand verzeichnet Dies wurde im Newsletter auf der Website des Verteidigungsministeriums der Russischen Föderation berichtet."Im russischen Teil der Vertretung der gemeinsamen russisch-türkischen Kommission zur Prüfung von Fragen, die sich auf Verstöße gegen die Haltung der Feindseligkeiten beziehen, wurden keine Tatsachen auf die Eröffnung des Feuers erfasst. text1: Polizeipräsidium Mittelfranken / Graffiti-Sprayer auf ...  (424) Graffiti-Sprayer auf frischer Handlung festgenommen - die Polizei untersuchte Nürnberg - am Donnerstagmorgentag (26.03.2020) Zeugen beobachteten einen Mann, der einen Graffiti auf eine Holzwand besprühte. Er wurde beim Sprühen immer noch verhaftet. Wenn kurz nach 11:00 Uhr, gab Zeugen des Polizei-Hauptquartiers bekannt, dass auf dem Kinderspielplatz in der Voltastraße ein unbekannter Mann eine Holzdrüsenwand strezte. Beamte des Polizeiinspektors Nürnberg-Süd fuhren an den Ort der Nutzung und nahmen den Mann auf frische Akte. In den Verdächtigen war es ein 25-jähriger, der eine sogenannte lackierende Schutzmaske zugeschrieben und zahlreiche Farbspraydosen herstellte, auf eine Fläche von ca. , 3 x 1,5 Meter ein komplexes Porträ außerhalb der Bürozeiten: Telefon: +49 (0)911 2112 1553 Telefax: +49 (0)911 2112 1525 Die Pressestelle des Polizeipräsidiums Mittelfranken im Internet: Weiteres Material: Polizeipräsidium Mittelfranken
text2:
Malaysian singer Afieq: I will not resort to cheap stunts to boost popularity
Singer Afieq Shazwan does not want to resort to cheap publicity stunts to boost his popularity, reported Berita Harian.

The 22-year-old revealed that certain parties had suggested that he should create a controversial scenario in a room, or pull other publicity stunts to gain popularity.

"But personally, I will not resort to creating cheap controversy for the sake of gaining popularity," said Afieq who had released the new single Lelaki di Telefon.

Afieq said he wanted to succeed in the entertainment industry purely on his talent.

"Peers used to bully me, making fun of my physical appearance when I was 17. I was skinny then. Then I gained muscles.

"Only after achieving results, I shared my weight-lifting workouts on social media," he said, adding he had engaged his uncle as his fitness trainer.

text1:
İspanya ölü sayısında Çin'i geçti: Bir günde 738 ölü
İspanya Sağlık Bakanlığı'nın paylaştığı verilere ülkede, ülkede son 24 saat içinde koronavirüs salgını nedeniyle 738 kişi daha yaşamını yitirdi ve toplam can kaybı 3 bin 434'e yükseldi. Ülkede virüsle enfekte olan kişi sayısı da bir 39 bin 673'ten 47 bin 610'a yükseldi.







Böylece İspanya, ölümlü vakalar bakımından, salgının ilk ortaya çıktığı Çin'i geride bırakmış oldu. Ayrıca, İtalya'nın ardından salgından en çok etkilenen ikinci ülke haline geldi.





İtalya'da 6 bin 820, Çin'de ise 3 bin 285 kişi salgın nedeniyle yaşamını yitirdi.
text2:
Dünya Sağlık Örgütü’nden korkutan uyarı
Tüm dünyayı etkisi altına alan koronavirüs nedeniyle binlerce insan hayatını kaybederken, vaka sayıları da hızla yükseliyor. Dünya Sağlık Örgütü (DSÖ), koronavirüs vakalarının 300 bini aşması üzerine salgının “hızlandığı” uyarısında bulundu.

DSÖ Genel Direktörü Tedros Adhonam Ghebreyesus yine de gidişatı değiştirmenin halen mümkün olduğu görüşünde. Ghebreyesus ülkelere çok daha fazla test uygulama çağrısı yaptı.

Salgını yenmek için atağa geçilmesi gerektiğini söyleyen DSÖ direktörü sağlık çalışanlarına öncelik verilmediği takdirde çok sayıda kişinin yaşamını yitireceğini ifade etti.

Öte yandan Ghebreyesuss henüz teste tabi tutulmayan ilaçların virüse karşı kullanılmasının yanlış umutlar doğurabileceği uyarısında da bulundu.

ABD’li Johns Hopkins Üniversitesi’nin verilerine göre bugüne kadar dünya genelinde 381 bin 621 vaka görüldü, virüs nedeniyle 16 bin 563 kişi hayatını kaybetti.

İlk vaka tespitinden 100 binincisine 67 gün, ikinci 100 bine 11 gün, üçüncü 100 bin vakaya ise dört günde ulaşıldı.

text1: Osm n Rivas y la odisea de aprender a vivir con un diagn stico de diabetes desde los tres a os A n siendo un ni o, Osm n tuvo que aprender de chequeos diarios e inyecciones de insulina. Pese a ello, ahora a sus 19 a os, asegura que el diagn stico no le ha impedido alcanzar sus metas; sue a con graduarse como t cnico en ingenier a automotriz. Por Vanessa Jurado 2020-01-01 9:13:08 Osm n Orlando Rivas ten a tan solo tres a os de edad cuando por primera vez disfrut un paseo familiar a unas piscinas. Un viaje divertido que tambi n dej al descubierto una condici n con la que deb a aprender a vivir: Diabetes tipo 1. En El Salvador se tienen registrados alrededor de 2 millones de pacientes diab ticos, seg n datos tomados de la ltima encuesta realizada en abuela, ninguna de las dos tienen diabetes a su edad, el aparecimiento de la diabetes en el joven pudo estar relacionada a la fuerte emoci n que vivi en el mencionado paseo, pero tambi n no se descarta que sus antepasados hayan tenido problemas de glucosa
text2: Marjorie de Sousa compartió su secreto para tener un cuerpo definido Caracas / Foto portada: Archivo.- La actriz venezolana, Marjorie De Sousa, compartió su secreto para mantener la silueta de su cuerpo definida. La publicación la realizó a través de su cuenta en la red social Instagram el pasado 27 de diciembre. Con una imagen en la que aparece sonriente, en una habitación, posando con poca ropa recostada de medio lado sobre un mueble, la actriz de 39 años de edad, enseñó que su secreto es usar faja. Asimismo, con su publicación dejó a sus cinco millones de seguidores ‘boquiarbiertos’ al tener un cuerpo tan conservado. “Cuando quieras que un traje te quede perfecto y no logren notar nada fuera de lugar yo uso esta Mi faja ‘Ann Chery’ ideal para usarla en estas fechas especiales con tu outfit favorito., ya sea con ejercicios, con yoga o buena alimentación. Aún cuando su hijito no alcance los dos años de edad, la actriz radicada en México, se muestra cada vez como el vino: mientras más añejo, más sabroso. Comentarios comentario

text1: 2020 年 1 月的夜空 太阳：1 月 5 日，地球处于近日点，这是今年最接近太阳的地方。到太阳的距离将是 1.47 亿公里。第一季度在 3 日，满月在 1 月 11 日。最后一个季度发生在 1 月 18 日，新月在 1 月 25 日落下。半人马座流星雨在 1 月 8 日达到顶峰，但月光会干扰观看。行星：水星在 11 日之后进入夜空，但离太阳太近而无法看到。金星是西方天空中的一个明亮天体，大约在晚上 11 点左右落下。火星在月中的凌晨 2.30 左右升起。它将在 19 日和 20 日出现在红星心宿二附近。心宿二将出现两者中更亮的一个。 21日，新月在火星三度范围内。木星应该在御夫座的对面出现，御驾者。在它上面可以找到昴星团和金牛座，而更东边是双子座。 - 为埃格蒙特角天文台的 Tom Whelan 准备的塔拉纳基每日新闻
text2:
January 2020 Astrological Forecast
click to enlarge NASA / Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory / Southwest Research Institute

Pluto

SATURN-PLUTO CONJUNCTION: GROW UP AND GET REAL

The long-awaited Saturn-Pluto conjunction in Capricorn arrives January 12. The astro-blogosphere's scare tactics trigger the fear factor, ominously hinting at international power clashes, constrictive structural and societal pressures around issues of borders and boundaries, and the powerful versus the powerless via this heavy, intense transit. Regardless of the global implications of the meeting of the cosmic timekeeper, Saturn, with raw, ruthless power-player Pluto, this transit need not inspire fear or dread if we accept that the purpose of change is to develop maturity. Growing up, getting real, and accepting personal responsibility is only scary if one has no role model for successful adulting. This month provides celestial parenting on a grand scale.

Maturity means accepting reality in all its messy ambiguity and imperfection. Good parents prepare their children to face reality. The "parents" here are the Full Moon/Lunar Eclipse in Moon-ruled Cancer, opposite the Sun, Saturn and Mercury in Capricorn January 10. Light, symbolic of consciousness, is darkened during an eclipse. When the Moon is re-revealed, she allows us to see our truth in a new, realistic, unromanticized light. With the Sun, Saturn, Pluto, Jupiter, and the South Lunar Node all in Capricorn now, that light reveals the shouldering of adult responsibility, the acceptance of hard work and personal sacrifice in order to nurture growth, nest a domestic environment, enhance emotional security and preserve ancestral heritage and family values.

The square of the Sun to Uranus January 22 portends shakeups in the hierarchal status quo. New Moon in Aquarius January 24 with Neptune's conjunction to Venus January 26 and square to Mars January 28 reveal the genuine. Authenticity's value skyrockets. It turns out our fears are only as scary as our refusal to grow up and get real. The more we accept the unvarnished truth, the wiser we grow.

text1: Jason Holder rested from West Indies squad for first two ODIs against Ireland Jason Holder has been rested from West Indies' squad for the first two ODIs against Ireland, to be played in Barbados on January 7 and 9. This is the only change from the most recent ODI squad that completed a tour of India last month, with its strength dropping from 15 to 14. "The decision was taken to rest Jason due to the heavy workload he has had over the last year," chief selector Roger Harper said in a statement. "With an important year ahead for West Indies cricket, we saw this as the best opportunity to give him a break to recharge his batteries and refresh his mind so he could be ready to perform at his best as our Test captain throughout 2020, as the number one ranked all-rounder in Test cricket and an important member of the team in the white ball formats." text2: Tighten your belts, get set for space trip; 4 IAF pilots selected for India's manned space mission No names were disclosed and sources said the BJP government will unravel the optics in the run-up to the mission. More than anything the space odyssey will be about messaging – the choice of the pilots and the areas they represent would be part of the matrix. The quartet will undergo training in Russia from the third week of this month. Though PM Modi had hinted in his Independence address on August 15, 2018, from the Red Fort that three Indians, including a woman, would be sent into space, ISRO chief K Sivan said that the crew would be male. IAF test pilot Wing Commander Rakesh Sharma was the first Indian to take a sojourn in outer space, albeit as a cosmonaut on board Russian craft Soyuz-T on April 2 project cost for Chandrayaan-3, Sivan said the cost of lander and rover configuration is about Rs 250 crore. The total cost of the project is Rs 615 crore. The objective of Chandrayaan-3 would also be to land on the lunar South Pole

text1: Los envíos de teléfonos inteligentes experimentan una caída récord a medida que el coronavirus detiene a los compradores CNET Para obtener las noticias e información más actualizadas sobre la pandemia de coronavirus, visite el sitio web de la OMS mercados más grandes y un centro de fabricación vital. En todo el mundo, los envíos de teléfonos cayeron un 38 % a 61,8 millones de unidades en febrero de 2020, desde los 99,2 millones de unidades del mismo mes del año pasado, según Strategy Analytics. La firma atribuyó la caída "enorme" a un colapso de la demanda en Asia. "Febrero de 2020 vio la mayor caída en la historia del mercado mundial de teléfonos inteligentes", dijo el analista de Strategy Analytics Neil Mawston. "La oferta y la demanda de teléfonos inteligentes se desplomaron en China, se desplomaron en Asia y se desaceleraron en el resto del mundo. Es un período en el que la industria de los teléfonos inteligentes desea iPads por persona. La última vez que Apple impuso tales límites fue en 2007, cuando llegó el iPhone original. Apple presentó esta semana dos nuevos productos, un nuevo iPad con una funda con teclado que tiene un panel táctil, así como una MacBook Air actualizada
text2:
Coronavirus: le vendite di smartphone crollano in mezzo alla pandemia
